NK073(pu)007:1: // slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis mdzad pa'i
NK073(pu)007:2: man ngag lta ba'i phreng ba'i mchan 'grel nor bu'i
NK073(pu)007:3: bang mdzod ces bya ba bzhugs so //
NK073(pu)007:5: na mo gu ru pad+ma many+dzu sh+r+ai ye /
NK073(pu)007:6: dpal ldan sangs rgyas pad+ma skyes //
NK073(pu)007:7: kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa //
NK073(pu)007:8: theg pa sna tshogs ston pa po //
NK073(pu)007:9: o rgyan dus gsum mkhyen pas skyongs //
NK073(pu)007:10: 'dir slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas kyi zhar
NK073(pu)007:11: snga nas stsal ba'i bstan bcos rtsod pa dang bral
NK073(pu)007:12: ba man ngag lta ba'i phreng ba nyid 'chad pa
NK073(pu)007:13: la gsum / klad kyi don gzhung gi don /
NK073(pu)007:19: chos thams cad ye nas rdzogs pa chen por lhun
NK073(pu)007:20: gyi grub pa'i tshul bstan pa rgyud dang lung thams
NK073(pu)007:21: cad kyi spyi dpal gsang ba'i snying po las /
NK073(pu)007:22: ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs //
NK073(pu)007:23: phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs //
NK073(pu)007:24: 'dul ba dgos pa gsang ba dang //
NK073(pu)007:25: rang bzhin gsang ba'i don rnams ni //
NK073(pu)007:26: yi ge sgras btags mig tshogs la //
NK073(pu)007:27: brten pa'i tshig gis rab mtshon te //
NK073(pu)007:28: khong nas gab spas don 'byin pa //
NK073(pu)007:29: ston pa rdo rje'i thugs la gnas //
NK073(pu)007:31: gang zag gi blo rim dang mthun par /
NK073(pu)007:32: ma rtogs pa 'jig rten phyal pa dang rgyang 'phen gnyis /
NK073(pu)007:33: log par rtogs pa phyi rol mur rtug pa dang mu stegs gnyis /
NK073(pu)007:34: phyogs tsam rtogs la nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba gnyis /
NK073(pu)007:35: yang dag nyid ma rtogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la gnas pa'i byang sems /
NK073(pu)007:38: gsang ba rnal 'byor chen po tshul sngags nang pa bskyed rdzogs gnyis /
NK073(pu)007:39: rang bzhin gsang ba rdzogs pa chen po'i tshul te /
NK073(pu)007:40: 'jig rten las 'das ma 'das kyi lta ba dang /
NK073(pu)007:41: khyad par du nyan rang byang sems te mtshan nyid kyi theg pa gsum dang /
NK073(pu)007:42: bya spyod rnal 'byor te sngags phyi pa gsum dang /
NK073(pu)007:43: bskyed rdzogs rdzogs chen te nang pa gsum bcas rnam grol gyi lam /
NK073(pu)007:44: theg pa rim pa dgu la stsogs pa ste de rnams gyi 'bras bu'ang ston pa'i /
NK073(pu)007:45: rnam pa mi 'dra ba'i khyad par mtha' dag gzhung
NK073(pu)007:46: nyung ngur bsdus te sngon gyi las can rgyal 'bangs
NK073(pu)007:47: nyer lnga sogs kyis brjed par dogs pa'i 'jigs pa
NK073(pu)007:48: sel ba'i phyir bskyud byang du gu ru nyid kyi
NK073(pu)007:49: mdzad pa ste don dang mthun par mtshan btags pa'o
NK073(pu)007:51: sgrib pa gnyis bag chags dang bcas pa bcoms shing
NK073(pu)007:52: rgyu 'bras phar phyin gyi legs pa'i yon tan drug
NK073(pu)007:53: dang ldan pas srid zhi'i mtha' gnyis las 'das pa
NK073(pu)007:54: thugs chos nyid spros pa'i zug rngu dang bral bas
NK073(pu)007:55: 'jam zhing don gnyis kyi 'byor ba'i dpal dang ldan
NK073(pu)007:56: pa rgyal sras gzhon nu yi tshul can te rgyu
NK073(pu)007:57: mtshan nyid kyi theg pa dang sgo bstun pa'i shes
NK073(pu)007:59: gnas lugs stong pa nyid kyi rdo rje spros mtshan
NK073(pu)007:60: gang gis kyang mi phyed cing thugs rje ma 'gags
NK073(pu)007:61: pa'am gsung chos kyi bdag nyid du ston pa gsang
NK073(pu)007:62: ba'i bdag po de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes 'bras
NK073(pu)007:63: bu gsang sngags kyi tshul dang sgo mthun par lhag
NK073(pu)007:64: pa'i lha la phyag mdzad pa'o //
NK073(pu)007:67: brtul zhugs kyi khyad par bshad pa la gnyis las /
NK073(pu)007:70: chos 'di pa rnams kyi lta bshad pa gnyis /
NK073(pu)007:71: dang po la bstan bshad gnyis las /
NK073(pu)007:73: 'jig pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams sam phyi snod kyi ris na /
NK073(pu)007:74: nang phung lnga'i rgyun blos ma phyed tsam la btags
NK073(pu)007:75: pa'i sems can nam gang zag ma rig pa dang
NK073(pu)007:76: mtshungs par ldan pas yang dag pa'i don las gol
NK073(pu)007:77: ba phyin ci log gi shes rab dang mos pa'i
NK073(pu)007:78: bye brag gis lta ba grangs med pa yod de
NK073(pu)007:79: log rtog mtha' med pa'i phyir ro //
NK073(pu)007:80: 'on kyang de'i mdo rnam pa bzhir 'dus te de
NK073(pu)007:81: la rnam pa'i sgra ni rgyu bye brag 'dra ba
NK073(pu)007:82: snang ba grangs rkyen rnams la 'jug pa las 'dir
NK073(pu)007:84: de yang grub mtha' dang theg pa med pas sam //
NK073(pu)007:85: don la zhe 'dod kyi gtad so med pas phyal
NK073(pu)007:86: ba dang bsam sbyor gyi steng nas 'jig rten pha
NK073(pu)007:87: rol la rtsis mi 'jog par rgyang ring du 'phen
NK073(pu)007:88: pa ltar byed pas na rgyang 'phen nam yang na
NK073(pu)007:89: 'jig rten ci tsam zhes tshe 'dir snang rgyang rgyang
NK073(pu)007:90: ngam breng breng po'i ngor phan pa tsam sgrub pa
NK073(pu)007:91: las don chen po dang bral bas na rgyang phan
NK073(pu)007:92: pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgya mtshor
NK073(pu)007:93: 'bab pa'i lam gyi chu rgyun gyi mu la stegs
NK073(pu)007:94: bcas shing rten pa skad du 'chad pas mu stegs
NK073(pu)007:95: pa dang / pa'o // de yang rgyang phan zhes
NK073(pu)007:96: pa sgra ma 'dom pa'i tshe sangs rgyas pa min
NK073(pu)007:97: pa'i phyi rol pa thun mong la 'jug ste /
NK073(pu)007:99: bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar na zhe'am /
NK073(pu)007:100: 'jig rten rgyang phan pa'i ltar na zhes gsungs pa lta bu yin la /
NK073(pu)007:101: 'dir lta ba rnam pa bzhi 'dom pa'i skabs su spyi'i sgra bye brag la 'jug par sbyar te /
NK073(pu)007:102: ji skad gsungs pa'i lta ba phyogs gcig tu sbyar ro //
NK073(pu)007:103: yang rgyang 'phen zhes phur bu'i lugs kyi rjes 'brang chad par lta ba rnams ni log rtogs te /
NK073(pu)007:104: mur thug pa lta bu ma yin la /
NK073(pu)007:106: 'di dang phyal ba gnyis kyis rgyu 'bras kyi dngos po rnam par ma dpyad par 'dra yang /
NK073(pu)007:107: 'di la tshe 'di'i don la 'jug pa'i blo gros cung gsal /
NK073(pu)007:108: cig shos mi gals ba'i khyad par yod de /
NK073(pu)007:109: phyi ma ni bde 'gro phal che ba'o //
NK073(pu)007:110: des na 'jig rten 'dir phan zhes pa'i sgra skabs
NK073(pu)007:111: kyis go bar bya dgos te mtha' gcig tu phur
NK073(pu)007:112: bu pa sogs la gzung na gzhung gi dgongs pa
NK073(pu)007:114: des na san+d+ha pa'i sgra bzhin du tshig la gnas
NK073(pu)007:115: skabs kyi go ba len pa ni bstan bcos thams
NK073(pu)007:116: cad 'chad pa la med du mi rung ngo //
NK073(pu)007:117: de bzhin mur thug kyang 'od srung gis zhus pa'i mdo las /
NK073(pu)007:118: 'od srung nga'i bstan pa ni mur thug dgu bcu
NK073(pu)007:119: rtsa drug gis ni 'jig par byed mi nus te
NK073(pu)007:120: / nga'i dge slong nga dang 'dra bas 'jig par byed par 'gyur ro //
NK073(pu)007:121: zhes phyi rol pa thun mong du bshad pa dang /
NK073(pu)007:122: mu stegs kyang rtag chad du smra ba'i phyi rol spyi la 'jug kyang /
NK073(pu)007:123: 'dir de gnyis rim pa ltar chad pa dang rtag
NK073(pu)007:124: par smra ba'i phyir rol pa spyi ming du sbyar
NK073(pu)007:125: bar byas na sgra don legs par 'phrod cing gzhung
NK073(pu)007:127: de la yang lam gyi gzhi mdor nor bu rin po che gcig gnas pa la /
NK073(pu)007:128: la las gzhi nas ma mthong /
NK073(pu)007:129: kha cig gis mching bur mthong /
NK073(pu)007:130: kha cig gis rin po che phal par mthong /
NK073(pu)007:131: kha cig gis ji lta ba bzhin mthong na /
NK073(pu)007:132: gzhi nas ma mthong ba rnams kyang /
NK073(pu)007:133: mthong stangs kyi mdo ris gcig tu byed pa dang
NK073(pu)007:134: 'dra bar rgyang phyal gnyis yang dag pa'i mthar thug
NK073(pu)007:135: gi gnas lugs ma rtogs pas gcig tu bzhag la
NK073(pu)007:136: / de dag ni ngan song gsum gtso bor gyur
NK073(pu)007:137: ba'i 'gro ba skye ba snga phyi la dpyod pa
NK073(pu)007:138: tsam yang mi shes pa'i rang gar blun pa phyugs
NK073(pu)007:139: / lta bu'o // de ni lta ba'i dma' shos te de las dman pa mi srid pas so //
NK073(pu)007:140: de lam la ma zhugs pa yin pas lta bar
NK073(pu)007:141: mi rung snyam na ma rig mtshungs ldan gyi sems
NK073(pu)007:142: kyis lta ba ma rtogs pa yin pas /
NK073(pu)007:143: lta ba gtan la phab pa'i skabs su spang byar shes dgos pa'i phyir du'o //
NK073(pu)007:144: de la sems can phal mo che de dag /
NK073(pu)007:145: dngos po la zhen cing 'jig tshogs la lta ba
NK073(pu)007:146: la gnas su zin kyang 'du shes dang shes rab
NK073(pu)007:147: kyi cha zhan pas rgyu 'bras kyi dngos po rnams
NK073(pu)007:148: la mtshan mar bzung nas bye brag ma phyes pa'i
NK073(pu)007:149: lta bu'i 'thib pos non pa'i phyir de skad ces
NK073(pu)007:150: bya'o // gnyis pa la gnyis las /
NK073(pu)007:151: dang po phyal rgyang gnyis bshad pa ni /
NK073(pu)007:152: de la phyal ba ni gang zhe na /
NK073(pu)007:153: 'di ltar phyi nang gi chos 'di dag thams cad
NK073(pu)007:154: gang 'byung ba'i rgyu dang gang byung ba'i 'bras bu
NK073(pu)007:155: 'di dag yod pa'am med pa dag tu yang ma
NK073(pu)007:156: rtogs te rang gar gnas pa ste de dag ni
NK073(pu)007:157: rgyu 'bras la kun tu rmongs pa'i ma rig pa
NK073(pu)007:159: rgyang 'phen nam rgyang phan pa ni /
NK073(pu)007:160: tshe snga phyi yod pa'am med pa dag tu ma
NK073(pu)007:161: rtogs shing tshe gcig la btsan phyugs dang mthu stobs
NK073(pu)007:162: sgrub pa yi thabs sna tshogs pa la 'bad par
NK073(pu)007:163: byed pa ste / de yang rnam grol gyi sgor ma gyur pa 'jig rten pas bshad pa /
NK073(pu)007:164: 'jig rten gyi bya ba sgrub pa 'tsho rtsis dang srid skyong dpyad sogs dang /
NK073(pu)007:165: gar shi'i ngan sngags dang mo bon 'dre mnan nas
NK073(pu)007:166: bdag mchod pa g.yang len sogs rang ngam gzhan la
NK073(pu)007:167: byed du 'jug pa lta bu 'jig rten pa'i gsang
NK073(pu)007:169: gnyis pa mur thug dang mu stegs kyi grub mtha' bshad pa ni /
NK073(pu)007:171: lta yul shes bya'i chos thams cad la rgyu dang 'bras bu med pa ste /
NK073(pu)007:172: de yang tshe gcig la skyes pa'i chos thams cad
NK073(pu)007:173: tshe snga ma'i las kyis ma 'phang bar spang la
NK073(pu)007:174: shwa mong dang chu la chu bur bzhin glo bur
NK073(pu)007:175: du skyes la mtha' mar me rgyun chad pa ltar
NK073(pu)007:178: rgyu 'bras kyi dngos po'i chos thams cad la med
NK073(pu)007:179: bzhin du kun tu brtag pa'i bdag ni rtag pa
NK073(pu)007:180: zhig yod par lta ba ste /
NK073(pu)007:181: de la'ang rang bzhin rgyu blta bas /
NK073(pu)007:182: rang bzhin rgyu rkyen med pa de'i ngo bor chos
NK073(pu)007:183: kun gyur pas rang bzhin rnam pa tha mi dad
NK073(pu)007:184: par 'dod pas bdag gcig pu ril por 'dzin pa
NK073(pu)007:185: zhes bya ste / snang ba'i dngos po ye nas grub pa yin la /
NK073(pu)007:186: de bskyed pa'i rgyu gzhan med par blta bas rgyu
NK073(pu)007:187: med pa la 'bras bu yod par lta ba dang
NK073(pu)007:188: zhes bya ste / de yang rgyu la ma ltos
NK073(pu)007:189: na 'bras bu ji ltar bzhag ce na yod pa
NK073(pu)007:191: nam mkha' gdod nas grub pa zhes bya ba bzhin te /
NK073(pu)007:192: 'di ni dmigs pa gcig pu yin no //
NK073(pu)007:193: rgyu 'bras log par lta ba dang /
NK073(pu)007:194: zhes pa ni dbang phyugs zhes bya ba'i gang zag gdod nas grub pa /
NK073(pu)007:196: g.yo mi g.yo'i dngos po thams cad la dbang bsgyur zhing rnam par 'phrul lo zhes bya zhing /
NK073(pu)007:197: dbang phyug mnyes pa'i slad du srog chags du ma'i mchod sbyin sogs byed la /
NK073(pu)007:198: 'di ni dmigs pa gnyis dang ldan te /
NK073(pu)007:199: dbang phyug rtag la sprul pa mi rtag zhes 'dod pa'o //
NK073(pu)007:200: 'dis mi dge'o las kyis mtho ris sgrub pas sam /
NK073(pu)007:201: rgyu rtag pas 'bras bu mi rtag pa bskyed pas de skad ces brjod do //
NK073(pu)007:202: rgyu yod la 'bras bu med par lta ba ste zhes /
NK073(pu)007:203: 'dis ni byed pa po rgyur lta ba ste /
NK073(pu)007:204: bdag rtag pa mthe bong tsam sogs rdza bcag bye'u 'phur bzhin du 'dod pa ste /
NK073(pu)007:205: 'di ni dmigs pa gsum dang ldan te bdag rtag
NK073(pu)007:206: pa rgyu'i bya ba kho na byed par 'dod pa
NK073(pu)007:207: dang / des byas 'bras phung po'i ngo bo mi rtag 'gyur ba'i chos can du 'dod pa dang /
NK073(pu)007:208: 'bras bu de yang thebs gcig gi 'bras bu tsam
NK073(pu)007:209: ste des phung po gzhan skyed pa'i rgyu med cing
NK073(pu)007:210: rgyun chad pa'o // rtag chad kyi lta ba de
NK073(pu)007:211: gnyis kyi khongs su phyi rol ba'i 'dod pa'i rtag
NK073(pu)007:212: chad kyi rnam pa ma lus pa zad par 'adu'o
NK073(pu)007:213: rgyun chad pa'o // // gong bstan bzhi po 'di
NK073(pu)007:214: dag ni rig pa'i mi mthun phyogs su gyur pa
NK073(pu)007:215: ma rig pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i lta bu'o
NK073(pu)007:216: rgyun chad pa'o // // // de la 'jig rten
NK073(pu)007:217: pa'i lta ba'i skabs 'dir ni lta ba tsam zhig
NK073(pu)007:218: rgyun chad pa'o // // // bstan gyi / lam
NK073(pu)007:219: dang 'bras bu ma bstan pa ni don med par
NK073(pu)007:221: gnyis pa la mdor bstan pa dang //
NK073(pu)007:224: zag med kyi lam dang rjes su 'brel pa 'jig
NK073(pu)007:225: rten las 'das pa'i lam la'ang dbye na rnam pa
NK073(pu)007:226: gnyis te / chos rnams kyi rang spyi dang kun
NK073(pu)007:227: byang gi mtshan nyid rnams so sor ma 'dres par
NK073(pu)007:228: ston cing de la spang blang du ston pa mtshan
NK073(pu)007:230: kun byang gnyis ngo bo dbyer med sku gsung thugs
NK073(pu)007:231: kyi dkyil 'khor du mi phyed par ston pa rdo
NK073(pu)007:232: rje'i theg pa'o // gnyis pa la mtshan nyid theg pa dang /
NK073(pu)007:233: sngags kyi theg pa'i rnam bzhag gnyis /
NK073(pu)007:236: mtshan nyid kyi theg pa la'ang skal pa dang mos
NK073(pu)007:237: pa dbang po'i bye brag gis mtshan nyid de la
NK073(pu)007:238: mngon par zhen ma zhen gyi dbang gis rnam pa
NK073(pu)007:239: gsum ste / rang nyid kyis gdams ngag bzhan las
NK073(pu)007:240: nyan cing gzhan la thos par byed pa nyan thos
NK073(pu)007:242: srid pa tha ma'i dus su rang nyid kyi bden
NK073(pu)007:243: pa'i 'bras bu khong du chud pa rang sangs rgyas
NK073(pu)007:245: byang chub kyi phyir bsam pa brtan pa'am byang chub
NK073(pu)007:246: dang sems can la dmigs pa yod pas byang chub
NK073(pu)007:251: byang sems kyi theg pa bshad pa gsum las /
NK073(pu)007:253: de la nyan thos kyi 'bras bu thob par byed
NK073(pu)007:254: pa rang lam gyi theg pa la zhugs pa yi
NK073(pu)007:255: gang zag rnams kyi lta ba ni grub pa'i mtha'
NK073(pu)007:256: ste shes rab kyis bcad pa ltar mos pas nges
NK073(pu)007:257: pa'o // 'dir lta sgom 'bras bu gsum du ston te /
NK073(pu)007:259: phung khams skye mched kyis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad
NK073(pu)007:260: la phyi rol mu stegs pa la sogs pas med
NK073(pu)007:261: pa la rtag par sgro btags pa dang /
NK073(pu)007:262: yod pa la med par skur pa'i rnam pa can
NK073(pu)007:263: gyi kun tu brtag pa ye med pa'am gtan nas
NK073(pu)007:264: med pa chad pa'i lta ba dang /
NK073(pu)007:265: rtag pa la stsogs pa'i yod pa ra lta ba
NK073(pu)007:266: ni thag pa la sprul du mthong ba yi sprul
NK073(pu)007:268: snang gzhi thag pa lta bu'i phung po dang khams
NK073(pu)007:269: dang skye mched la sogs pa'i bdag nyid ni phyi
NK073(pu)007:270: rol gyi gzugs sogs bem po ni rags par snang
NK073(pu)007:271: ba'i rgyu 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i rdul phra rab
NK073(pu)007:272: dang / nang gi rnam par shes pa skad cig
NK073(pu)007:273: ma ni don dam par ram bden par yod par
NK073(pu)007:274: dang / lta zhing / 'di la bye smra dang
NK073(pu)007:275: mdo sde pa gnyis po snga mas 'dus ma byas
NK073(pu)007:277: phyi mas mo gsham gyi bu bzhin gtan med du
NK073(pu)007:278: 'dod pa sogs nang cung mi mthun zhing bye smra
NK073(pu)007:279: la'ang so so'i 'dod pa phra mo mi mthun pa
NK073(pu)007:280: mang yang / don du rdul dang skad cig bden
NK073(pu)007:281: par khas len pa 'dra bas gcig tu bzhag go
NK073(pu)007:282: mang yang / // bsgom pa bsam gtan gyi rig pa dang /
NK073(pu)007:283: sdug kun 'gog lam ste 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bsgoms pa ste /
NK073(pu)007:284: de yang ngo bo ji lta ba yin pas phyin ci log med pas bden la /
NK073(pu)007:285: 'phags pa rnams kyis thugs su chud pa'am 'phags pa'i rang bzhin yin pas kyang ngo //
NK073(pu)007:286: bden pa de dag kyang khams gsum gyi bden bzhi
NK073(pu)007:287: la dmigs nas rnam pa bcu drug gi tshul can
NK073(pu)007:289: nam zhig shes bzod skad cig ma bu drug gi
NK073(pu)007:290: rang bzhin can gyi ye shes mthong ba'i lam skye
NK073(pu)007:291: zhing / de nas rim gyis khams gsum sa dgu'i
NK073(pu)007:292: nyon mongs pa sgom spang rnams rim par spang ste
NK073(pu)007:293: zhing / / de yang 'dod nyon dgu'i rnam pa
NK073(pu)007:294: gsum pa bzhi pa yan chad las grol ba rgyun
NK073(pu)007:295: zhing / / zhugs / drug pa spang ba lan gcig phyir 'ong /
NK073(pu)007:296: dgu pa spang pa phyir mi 'ong /
NK073(pu)007:297: srid rtse'i nyon mongs pa ma lus pa spang ba
NK073(pu)007:298: dgra bcom ste 'bras bu rnam pa bzhi 'grub pa
NK073(pu)007:299: yin no // gnyis pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi
NK073(pu)007:300: 'bras bu'i ngo bo 'dus ma byas ba'i mtshan nyid
NK073(pu)007:301: de thob par byed pa'i lam gyi theg pa la
NK073(pu)007:302: zhugs pa rnams gyi lta ba ni /
NK073(pu)007:303: chos thams cad la mu stegs la sogs pas sgro
NK073(pu)007:304: dang skur pa'i kun tu brtag pa'i bdag rtag pa
NK073(pu)007:305: dang chad pa la sogs pa med par lta ba
NK073(pu)007:307: de las khyad par du phung po lnga las gzugs
NK073(pu)007:308: kyi phung po'i skye mched dang khams las gzugs can
NK073(pu)007:309: bcu dang chos kyi khams kyi phyogs gcig rnam par
NK073(pu)007:310: rig byed min pa'i gzugs te mdor na gzugs kyi
NK073(pu)007:311: phung por gtogs pa'i chos la bdag med par rtogs
NK073(pu)007:312: shig de goms pas nam zhig srid pa tha mar
NK073(pu)007:313: rang byang chub kyi 'bras bu thob pa'i dus na'ang
NK073(pu)007:314: nyan thos ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ma ltos
NK073(pu)007:315: par / ji ltar sgom pa'i tshul /
NK073(pu)007:316: sngon dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa sogs su
NK073(pu)007:317: sangs rgyas la bsten cing sbyangs pa goms pa'i shugs
NK073(pu)007:318: kyis bden bzhi'i rang bzhin can gyi rten cing 'brel
NK073(pu)007:319: bar 'gyur ba yan lag bcu gnyis kyi don rtogs
NK073(pu)007:320: te / de yang sdug bsngal bdun sdug bden nyon mongs gsum dang las gnyis kun 'byung /
NK073(pu)007:321: kun nyon de dag bral ba 'gog bden /
NK073(pu)007:322: der 'gro ba'i lam rten 'brel gyi don rtogs nas goms pa lam mo //
NK073(pu)007:323: rnam pa gcig tu na yan lag bcu gnyis re re la'ang bzhi bzhi ldan te /
NK073(pu)007:324: de dag rang gi bdag nyid thob pa sdug bden /
NK073(pu)007:325: de dag gcig rkyen gcig gis 'grub pa kun 'byung /
NK073(pu)007:327: de dag 'gog pa'i phyir de nyid phyin ci ma log par sgom pa lam ste /
NK073(pu)007:328: de ltar na bden bzhi la dmigs pa'i ye shes skad cig ma bcu drug kyang /
NK073(pu)007:329: yan lag re re la 'byung bas /
NK073(pu)007:330: ye shes skad cig ma brgya dgu bcu rtsa gnyis /
NK073(pu)007:331: stan gcig gi steng du skyes nas rang byang chub kyi 'bras bu thob bo //
NK073(pu)007:332: de lta bu'i sgo nas sgyu ma lta bu'i chos nyid zab mo'i don rtogs te /
NK073(pu)007:333: de yang brjod du med pa'i ngag shin tu 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas kyang /
NK073(pu)007:334: brjod du med do snyam pa'i 'du shes ni 'jug ste 'jig pa'i rtog pa ma spang bas so //
NK073(pu)007:335: de yang rten 'brel ni kun gyi lam thun mong ste /
NK073(pu)007:336: nyan thos pas rgyu 'bras kyi mtshan nyid la mngon
NK073(pu)007:337: par zhen pas phyi rol bas rgyu 'bras la log
NK073(pu)007:339: rang rgyal gyis de las zab tu rtogs te /
NK073(pu)007:340: rgyu 'bras kyi ngo bo gzung ba'i don du yang med par rtogs /
NK073(pu)007:341: rnal 'byor spyod pas de bas kyang zab tu rtogs te /
NK073(pu)007:342: rgyu 'bras kyi dngos po 'dzin pa'i bdag tu yang med par rtogs /
NK073(pu)007:343: dbu ma pas rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po rang
NK073(pu)007:344: rig pa'i bdag nyid du yang med par rtogs pas
NK073(pu)007:345: spros pa nye bar zhi ba'o //
NK073(pu)007:346: de ltar lam sgom tshul bstan nas /
NK073(pu)007:348: tshogs na spyod pa dang bse ru lta bu'i rang byang chub kyi 'bras bu thob pa yin no //
NK073(pu)007:350: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa zhes rgyu'i snga nas smos pa ste /
NK073(pu)007:351: 'bras bu ni gsang sngags dang bye brag med pas
NK073(pu)007:352: sngags phar phyin gnyis ka theg pa chen por gcig
NK073(pu)007:353: kyang / lam gyis bye brag tu bya ba'i phyir
NK073(pu)007:354: mtshan nyid kyi theg pa de la zhugs pa rnams
NK073(pu)007:356: kun nas nyon mongs pa 'khor ba rgyu 'bras dang bcas pa dang /
NK073(pu)007:357: rnam par byang ba'i chos myang 'das rgyu 'bras dang
NK073(pu)007:358: bcas pa de thams cad don dam par ni bden
NK073(pu)007:359: pa'i rang bzhin du grub pa gang yang med pa
NK073(pu)007:360: yin la / de yang don dam rang gi ngo
NK073(pu)007:361: bo ni spros pa dang bral ba la bya ste
NK073(pu)007:362: yin la / / sgra don ye shes dam pa'i
NK073(pu)007:363: yul yin pas sam thob bya rnams kyi nang nas
NK073(pu)007:364: dam pa yin pas de skad ces brjod de /
NK073(pu)007:365: 'di la dbye na spros pa phyogs re chad pa rnams grangs kyi don dam dang /
NK073(pu)007:366: spros pa mtha' dag yongs su zhi ba rnam grangs ma yin pa'i don dam gnyis su yod do //
NK073(pu)007:367: kun rdzob ni 'khrul pa'i shes pa snang ba dang bcas pa ste /
NK073(pu)007:368: yang dag pa'i don la sgrib pas sam glo bur
NK073(pu)007:369: 'khrul pa'i blos bardzabasa shing brtags te rnam par bzhag
NK073(pu)007:370: pas de skad ces brjod de /
NK073(pu)007:371: dbye na yang dag dang log pa'i kun rdzob gnyis yod /
NK073(pu)007:372: kun rdzob de'i dbang du bden med kyi snang ba sgyu ma tsam du snang ste /
NK073(pu)007:373: 'dir tsam sgras yang dag par grub pa gcod do //
NK073(pu)007:374: snang tsam po de'i ngor rang rang gi bya ba
NK073(pu)007:375: byed ba sogs kyi nus pa med ces skur pa
NK073(pu)007:376: gdab tu mi rung bas spyod yul yongs su dag
NK073(pu)007:377: ma dag sogs so so'i mtshan nyid ma 'dres par
NK073(pu)007:378: yod de rang gzhal byed tha snyad kyi tshad ma'i
NK073(pu)007:380: de ltar gnang skabs tshad ma gnyis kyi ngor nges par bya ba dang /
NK073(pu)007:381: mthar thug snang stong zung 'jug bden gnyis dbyer med
NK073(pu)007:382: spros bral mnyam pa chen po'i tshul du legs par
NK073(pu)007:383: gtan la phab nas sgom pa'i lam bstan pa'i phyir
NK073(pu)007:384: shes rab thams cad kyi nang nas dam par gyur
NK073(pu)007:385: cing mthar phyin pa ni gnyis su med pa'i ye
NK073(pu)007:386: shes yin pas / des zin pa'i sbyin sogs dge
NK073(pu)007:387: ba'i chos bcu la pha rol du phyin par bcu
NK073(pu)007:388: shes yin pas / zhes bya ste / 'di la
NK073(pu)007:389: phar phyin gyi sgra shes rab las 'das te yul
NK073(pu)007:391: chos nyid spros bral la bya ste 'di pha rol du phyin pas dang /
NK073(pu)007:392: 'dir 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol du phyin pas
NK073(pu)007:393: de skad ces brjod de lam la sbyar ba'i tshul
NK073(pu)007:394: gnyis yod do // de ltar spyod pa'i gnas skabs
NK073(pu)007:395: kyi 'bras bu sa bcu po rim gyis bgrod pa'i
NK073(pu)007:396: mthar thug gi 'bras bu nyan rang sogs las khyad
NK073(pu)007:397: par du gyur pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la
NK073(pu)007:398: sogs pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad yongs su
NK073(pu)007:399: rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi bla na med pa'i
NK073(pu)007:400: byang chub tu grub par 'dod pa yin no //
NK073(pu)007:404: rdo rje theg pa de la'ang dbye na rnams gsum ste /
NK073(pu)007:405: nang gi ting nge 'dzin rgyu'i gtso bo yin mod
NK073(pu)007:406: kyi phyi'i gtsang spra dang dka' thub sogs kyi bya
NK073(pu)007:407: ba lam ltos par dngos grub mi thob par 'dod
NK073(pu)007:408: pa bya ba'i rgyud kyi theg pa dang /
NK073(pu)007:409: phyi'i bya ba dang nang gi ting nge 'dzin gnyis
NK073(pu)007:410: kas grub par 'dod pa gnyis ka'i rgyud kyi theg
NK073(pu)007:411: pa dang / phyi'i bya ba la ma thos kyang
NK073(pu)007:412: nang gi ting nge 'dzin 'ba' zhig gi grub par
NK073(pu)007:413: 'dod pa rnal 'byor rgyud kyi theg pa'o //
NK073(pu)007:417: rnal 'byor rgyud kyi rnam par bzhag pa gsum las /
NK073(pu)007:419: de la bya ba'i rgyud kyi theg pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi lta ba ni /
NK073(pu)007:420: don dam par chos thams cad rang gi ngo bo skye 'gag med pa las /
NK073(pu)007:421: kun rdzob tu lha'i gzugs kyi skur sgom zhing zhes
NK073(pu)007:422: byang chub kyi sems dang de nyid gsum dang ldan
NK073(pu)007:423: pa ni dngos grub kyi snod du bshad do //
NK073(pu)007:424: de la de nyid gsum ni /
NK073(pu)007:425: bdag gi de kho na nyid dang /
NK073(pu)007:426: lha'i de kho na nyid dang /
NK073(pu)007:427: bzlas brjod kyi de kho na nyid de /
NK073(pu)007:428: de gsum gyis rim par 'khor ba'i chos kyi rang bzhin dang /
NK073(pu)007:429: mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
NK073(pu)007:430: de sgrub pa'i thabs kyi mtshan nyid rnams bsdus pa ste /
NK073(pu)007:431: de la bdag gi de kho na nyid phung lnga'i
NK073(pu)007:432: don blos rnam par ma phye tsam ni bdag yin
NK073(pu)007:433: la / de'i de nyid ni nyan thos dang sgo bstun na /
NK073(pu)007:434: mu stegs pas brtags pa'i bdag dang bdag gi dang rtag chad sogs kun tu brtags pa stong pa /
NK073(pu)007:435: phung sogs kyi chos tsam med par skur ba gdab tu mi rung ba'o //
NK073(pu)007:437: nyan thos kyi brtags pa'i gzug 'dzin kun brtags kyis stong pa /
NK073(pu)007:438: sems dang sems byung rang rig pa tsam med par skur pa gdab tu mi rung ba tsam mo //
NK073(pu)007:440: sems tsam pas rnam par mi rtogs pa'i ye shes
NK073(pu)007:441: don dam par yod par brtags pas kyang stong ste
NK073(pu)007:442: spros pa'i mtshan ma thams cad yongs su zhi ba
NK073(pu)007:444: lha'i de kho na nyid ni chos nyid dang sgra
NK073(pu)007:445: la sogs pa gsang sngags kyi dngos po lha drug
NK073(pu)007:447: de yang bdag gi de kho na nyid gser gyi glegs bam lta bu la /
NK073(pu)007:448: lha'i de nyid dngul chu zhun ma lta bus bgos te slar bsgom par bzhed do //
NK073(pu)007:449: bzlas brjod kyi de kho na nyid ni de nyid gsum /
NK073(pu)007:451: dmigs pa gsum yan lag bzhi ldan te /
NK073(pu)007:452: de la de nyid gsum ni ye shes ming gzugs gsum te /
NK073(pu)007:453: de yang don dam par lha'i chos nyid dag pa
NK073(pu)007:454: dang bdag gi chos nyid ma dag pa gnyis rang
NK073(pu)007:455: bzhin bye brag med par rtogs nas /
NK073(pu)007:456: de bzhin du sgom pa ste /
NK073(pu)007:457: lha'i ye shes rang rig dag pa dang bdag gi
NK073(pu)007:458: shes pa rang rig ma dag pa gnyis rang bzhin
NK073(pu)007:460: de bzhin du lha'i sku dang gsung khyad par du 'phags par snang ba dang /
NK073(pu)007:461: rang gi lus dang ngag khyad par can min par snang ba'am bye brag med par shes te /
NK073(pu)007:462: de la brten nas kun rdzob tu'ang lhar bsgyur zhing bskyed de bsgoms pas /
NK073(pu)007:463: 'khrul pa dag pa nyid 'bras bu'i lhar ngo bo grub par lta ba'o //
NK073(pu)007:464: gzugs brnyan chen po gsum ni /
NK073(pu)007:465: tshul de dang mthun par bsgom pa ste sku mtshan dper gsal ba sku'i gzugs brnyan /
NK073(pu)007:466: de'i thugs kar byang chub sems kyi rtags zla dkyil bsgom pa thugs kyi gzugs brnyan /
NK073(pu)007:467: de la snying po bkod pa gsung gi gzugs brnyan no //
NK073(pu)007:468: dmigs pa gsum ni bzlas brjod kyi dus su ye shes sems dpa' mdun du dmigs pa la /
NK073(pu)007:469: gzugs brnyan gsum po de kun kyang dmigs par bya ba yin pas dmigs pa gsum mo //
NK073(pu)007:471: dmigs pa gsum bdag dam tshig sems dpa' zlos pa
NK073(pu)007:472: po dang bzhi char yang bzlas brjod kyi yan lag
NK073(pu)007:474: dmigs pa gnyis dang yan lag gsum sogs de yis bsdus par zad do //
NK073(pu)007:475: des na rang nyid lhar min kyang rgyu rkyen gyis
NK073(pu)007:476: nam zhig 'gyur snang bas rgyud de lhar lta ba'o
NK073(pu)007:477: // de'i grogs su rigs gsum gang la mos pa'i sku'i gzugs brnyan bris sam blugs ma dang /
NK073(pu)007:478: rigs gsum thugs kyi gzugs brnyan nam mtshan ma dang ste /
NK073(pu)007:479: 'ching ba dam tshig gi phyag rgya /
NK073(pu)007:480: 'dzin pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya /
NK073(pu)007:481: bsam pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya gsum las /
NK073(pu)007:482: dang po rnal 'byor pas rdor dril /
NK073(pu)007:483: gnyis pa ye shes sems dpa'i thugs mtshan pad+ma rdo rje ral gri sogs /
NK073(pu)007:484: gsum pa dam ye'i thugs mtshan bsgom pa la bya'o //
NK073(pu)007:485: gsung gi gzugs brnyan bzlas brjod dang ste /
NK073(pu)007:489: dang po ji ltar dam bcas pa ltar /
NK073(pu)007:490: gnyis pa zla tshe g.yal lu mi tshig sogs kyi skyon med pa /
NK073(pu)007:491: gsum pa grangs mthar phyin pa'i /
NK073(pu)007:492: phyi'i spyod lam phyi nang gi khrus sogs spyod yul dag pa'i gtsang sbra dang /
NK073(pu)007:493: bya ba dang 'jug pa'i dus tshig dang /
NK073(pu)007:494: gza' phur bu sogs dang rgyu skar rgyal la sogs
NK073(pu)007:495: rtsis kyi la nye thams cad pa gtso bor phyi'i
NK073(pu)007:496: yo byad dang / rgyu lta ba dang rkyen phyi
NK073(pu)007:497: nang gi yo byad sogs tshogs pa'i mthu las dngos
NK073(pu)007:499: 'dir don dam skye 'gags med pa dang /
NK073(pu)007:500: kun rdzob tu lhar bsgom pa'i tshul so so tsam bstan gyis /
NK073(pu)007:501: kun rdzob kyi spyod yul la dag ma dag ji ltar blta ba'i tshul dang /
NK073(pu)007:502: 'bras bu'i khyad par dag ni ma gsungs te /
NK073(pu)007:504: kun rdzob tu lhar bsgom mo zhes gsungs pa nyid kyis /
NK073(pu)007:505: kun rdzob tu lhar blta'o zhes smos mi dgos te /
NK073(pu)007:506: lta bas ji ltar bcad pa bzhin du ting nge 'dzin gyis goms par byed pa yin te /
NK073(pu)007:507: gang gi phyir lta ba dang sgom pa ni 'gal du mi rung ste /
NK073(pu)007:508: rig pa dang rkang par ldan dgos pa'i phyir dang /
NK073(pu)007:509: gsang sngags kyi gzhung dmigs pa rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul can yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK073(pu)007:511: thung mong gi las dang dngos grub dag mi mthun yang /
NK073(pu)007:512: mchog gi dngos grub bla na med pa'i byang chub mtshungs pas gud du ma smos so //
NK073(pu)007:514: gnyis ka'i rgyud kyi theg pa la zhugs pa rnams
NK073(pu)007:515: kyi lta ba ni don dam par skye 'gag med
NK073(pu)007:516: pa las kun rdzob tu lha'i gzugs kyi skur bsgom
NK073(pu)007:517: zhing de nyid rnams bzhi dang ldan par bsgom pa'i
NK073(pu)007:518: ting nge 'dzin zhes bdag gi de kho na nyid
NK073(pu)007:519: dang / lha'i de kho na nyid dang /
NK073(pu)007:520: ting nge 'dzin gyi de kho na nyid /
NK073(pu)007:521: bzlas pa'i de kho na nyid bzhi /
NK073(pu)007:522: dang po ni bdag dam tshig par bskyed pa'o //
NK073(pu)007:523: gnyis pa ye shes pa spyan drangs nas smin thad bzhugs pa'o //
NK073(pu)007:525: bdag mdun gyi thugs ka na zla ba dang yig 'bru klag sngags bkod pa'o //
NK073(pu)007:526: bzhi pa ni dbugs dang sprad de phar 'phros thugs dam bskul /
NK073(pu)007:527: tshur byung dngos grub stsol ba'i dmigs pa dang bcas skyon bcu spang la bzlas pa'o //
NK073(pu)007:528: nang gi ting nge 'dzin de dang /
NK073(pu)007:529: phyi'i yo byad dang rgyu rkyen tshogs pa dang dam
NK073(pu)007:530: tshig ma nyams pa la stsogs pa gnyis ka bsten
NK073(pu)007:531: pa las thun mong gi grub pa dang mchog gi
NK073(pu)007:532: rigs bzhi rdo rje 'chang gis 'grub par 'dod pa'o
NK073(pu)007:533: // gsum pa la bstan bshad gnyis kyi /
NK073(pu)007:535: chos nyid kyi don la reg pa rnal 'byor rgyud
NK073(pu)007:536: kyi theg pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi lta ba
NK073(pu)007:538: kun rdzob tu bdag dang sangs rgyas mnyam par mi lta ba dang /
NK073(pu)007:539: spyod pa mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs dang du mi len
NK073(pu)007:540: pa ni rnal 'byor phyi pa ste bsrung med kyi
NK073(pu)007:541: dam tshig nyams su len mi nus par thun mong
NK073(pu)007:542: gi sdom pa rnams dang ma bral bas sam sgo
NK073(pu)007:543: gsum gsang gsum du sgom nas mi mthun pa'i phyogs
NK073(pu)007:544: kyi dbang du mi 'gyur bas na thub pa rgyud
NK073(pu)007:546: gong las bzlos ste rnal 'byor nang pa cir snang
NK073(pu)007:547: bde ba chen por dbang sgyur ba'i thabs mkhas kyi
NK073(pu)007:549: gnyis pa la rnal 'byor phyi rgyud dang /
NK073(pu)007:550: bla med rgyud kyi rnam bzhag gnyis /
NK073(pu)007:552: de la rnal 'byor phyi pa thub pa'i rgyud kyi
NK073(pu)007:553: theg pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi lta ba ni
NK073(pu)007:554: / kri ya ltar phyi'i yo byad la gtso bor
NK073(pu)007:555: mi 'dzin par don dam par skye 'gag med pa'i
NK073(pu)007:556: rang bzhin snang char shar ba lha dang lha mo
NK073(pu)007:557: / dang / sgom pa lta ba de dang rnam
NK073(pu)007:558: pa 'dra ba'i rgyud yongs su dag pa'i ting nge
NK073(pu)007:559: 'dzin gyis 'phags pa'i gzugs kyi sku zhes /
NK073(pu)007:561: sems pa'i bye brag gi lha gnyis ni /
NK073(pu)007:563: kun rdzob kyi snang cha'i lha gnyis yin pa /
NK073(pu)007:564: de'i char gtogs pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i lhar bsgom pa
NK073(pu)007:565: dam tshig can gyi skye bos btags pa'i lha ste
NK073(pu)007:566: / de ltar goms na bden gnyis lha'i rang bzhin
NK073(pu)007:567: yin pa'i tshul mngon du gyur par byed pa'i ting
NK073(pu)007:568: nge 'a dzin la yang mngon byang lnga dang cho
NK073(pu)007:569: 'phrul chen po bzhi'i sgo nas bskyed cing phyag rgya
NK073(pu)007:570: bzhi dang ldan par bya ste /
NK073(pu)007:571: sku phyag rgya chen po sku dngos /
NK073(pu)007:572: de'i rgyu yin 'bru dang phyag mtshan sogs so //
NK073(pu)007:573: gsung chos kyi phyag rgya ljags steng rdo rje rtse lnga sogs bsgom pa /
NK073(pu)007:575: 'dzin pa ye shes lnga thugs su chud pa'i rtags rdo rje rtse lnga sogs rnam pa dang /
NK073(pu)007:577: phrin las las rgya thugs kar zla steng rdo rje
NK073(pu)007:578: rgya gram las 'od zer 'phro 'dus 'phags pa spyan
NK073(pu)007:579: drangs pa 'gro ba'i don byed pa sogs te de
NK073(pu)007:580: dag gis bdag nyid chen po rnams kyi sku gsung
NK073(pu)007:581: thugs phrin las dang bcas pa'i tshul lam mi 'da'
NK073(pu)007:583: de dang po gcig par rgyal 'debs pa'i tshul gyis
NK073(pu)007:584: bsgoms pa'i nang gi rnal 'byor gtso bor byas pa
NK073(pu)007:585: las thun mong dang mchog gi dngos grub 'grub par
NK073(pu)007:589: rnal 'byor nang pa thabs kyi rgyud kyi theg pa
NK073(pu)007:590: la zhugs pa rnams kyi lta ba ni rnam pa
NK073(pu)007:591: gsum ste / thabs bskyed pa gtso bor ston pa bskyed pa'i tshul ma h+aa yo ga dang /
NK073(pu)007:592: shes rab rdzogs rim shas cher ston pa rdzogs pa'i tshul a nu yo ga dang /
NK073(pu)007:593: gnyis med zur 'jug gtso bor ston pa a ti rdzogs pa chen po'i tshul lo //
NK073(pu)007:595: tshul gsum spyir bshad pa dang /
NK073(pu)007:596: de la 'jug pa'i sgo bye brag tu bshad pa gnyis las /
NK073(pu)007:600: rdzogs pa chen po'i tshul gsum las /
NK073(pu)007:602: de la bskyed pa'i tshul ni /
NK073(pu)007:603: nang rgyud gsum po 'di dag gis bskyed na ni lha yin la /
NK073(pu)007:604: ma bskyed na lhar mi lta ba ma yin te /
NK073(pu)007:605: rgyu 'bras dbyer med par lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du lta bar mthun pas so //
NK073(pu)007:606: 'on kyang ti nge 'dzin gyis rtsal sbyang ba rim gyis sbyang bar bya ba tsam du zad do //
NK073(pu)007:607: de la chos thams cad gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor du sangs rgyas par lta ba la /
NK073(pu)007:608: rang bzhin gyi sangs rgyas dang /
NK073(pu)007:611: dang po sems can rnams te /
NK073(pu)007:614: skye ba rten pa'i sangs rgyas /
NK073(pu)007:615: skye ba mngon par grub pa'i sangs rgyas so //
NK073(pu)007:616: de'i dang po las 'grub pa'i rgyu khu rdul sems gsum /
NK073(pu)007:617: gnyis pa pha ma gnyis kyi lus sems kyi khams thams cad /
NK073(pu)007:618: gsum pa rang gi lus mngon par grub pa'i skabs te /
NK073(pu)007:619: de gsum po kun tu rang bzhin gyis sangs rgyas pa'o //
NK073(pu)007:620: gnyis pa rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rig 'dzin gyi sa la gnas pa rnams so //
NK073(pu)007:621: gsum pa grub pa'i sangs rgyas ni de nyid mngon du gzigs pa'o //
NK073(pu)007:622: 'di rnams kyang rang bzhin dang gnas skabs kyi bye brag tu 'dod do //
NK073(pu)007:623: des na sangs ma rgyas pa'i chos ma dmigs kyang /
NK073(pu)007:624: ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba dang /
NK073(pu)007:625: ma goms pa goms par bya ba'i phyir /
NK073(pu)007:626: sangs rgyas kyi sa gsum la blo sbyang bar 'dod de /
NK073(pu)007:627: de yang kun tu 'od kyi sa la blo sbyang
NK073(pu)007:628: ba'i phyir de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam
NK073(pu)007:629: par mi rtog pa sgom pa dang /
NK073(pu)007:630: pad+ma can gyi sa la goms par bya ba'i phyir
NK073(pu)007:631: kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin shes rab dang
NK073(pu)007:633: yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen gyi sa la goms
NK073(pu)007:634: par bya ba'i phyir rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin yig 'bru
NK073(pu)007:635: bsgom pa ste ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum rim
NK073(pu)007:636: gyis bskyed de / de goms pa na rten dang
NK073(pu)007:637: brten pa'i dkyil 'khor rim gyis bkod cing bsgoms pas
NK073(pu)007:640: rdzogs pa'i tshul a nu yo ga ni /
NK073(pu)007:641: rnal 'byor rgyud kyi gzhung las grags pa'i sgom zhing nyams su blang bar bya ba'i don thams cad /
NK073(pu)007:642: byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin rig pa skad cig
NK073(pu)007:643: ma gcig la rdzogs par gsal bar sgom pa nus
NK073(pu)007:644: pa'i dbang du gsungs pa ste /
NK073(pu)007:645: de yang gnyis las ma g.yos bzhin du gcig tu gsal /
NK073(pu)007:646: gcig tu dbyer med bzhin du gsum du ma 'dres pa ste /
NK073(pu)007:647: rgya mtsho la gza' skar shar ba'am /
NK073(pu)007:648: rdzu 'phrul can gyi spyod lam bzhi dus gcig tu ston pa bzhin no //
NK073(pu)007:649: de la don dam par skye 'gag med pa'i rang
NK073(pu)007:650: bzhin du lhun gyis grub pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil
NK073(pu)007:651: 'khor lha dang lha mo yi rang bzhin snang srid
NK073(pu)007:652: thams cad sangs rgyas pa'i dgongs don las ma g.yos
NK073(pu)007:653: pa dang gcig / mtha' gang du yang rnam par
NK073(pu)007:654: mi rtog pa'i don dbu ma chos kyi dbyings las
NK073(pu)007:655: kyang ma g.yos pa gnyis ni ma g.yos pa gnyis
NK073(pu)007:656: pa dang gcig / zhes bya la / de las
NK073(pu)007:657: ma g.yos bzhin du kun rdzob tu phung khams skye
NK073(pu)007:658: mched thams cad lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis dkyil
NK073(pu)007:659: 'khor 'phags pa'i gzugs kyi sku'ang gsal bar bsgoms pa
NK073(pu)007:660: pa dang gcig / zhes bya la / ni / gsal ba gcig ces bya zhing /
NK073(pu)007:661: cir snang ci sgom thams cad chos nyid byang chub
NK073(pu)007:662: sems skye 'gag med pa'i dbyings su mnyam pa ni
NK073(pu)007:663: gcig tu dbyer med ces bya la /
NK073(pu)007:665: thams cad lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du bsgom pa'ang ting nge 'dzin gzhan dang ma 'dres /
NK073(pu)007:666: lhag ting gi dkyil 'khor du sku mdog phyag rgya mtshan sogs gsal ba yang gzhan dang ma 'dres /
NK073(pu)007:667: gtso gzugs 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa so
NK073(pu)007:668: sor ma 'dres par byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin
NK073(pu)007:669: rig pa skad cig ma gcig la gsal ba ste
NK073(pu)007:671: de yang btsal med lhun gyis grub par sbyor nus shing /
NK073(pu)007:672: phyogs dus mnyam pa nyid du sbyor nus na ni rdzogs chen dang khyad med kyang /
NK073(pu)007:673: 'dir sbyor ba rtsol ba dang bcas pa dang /
NK073(pu)007:675: skad cig ma dus su sbyor te skad cig la don thams cad rdzogs par sbyar ro //
NK073(pu)007:676: bskyed rdzogs 'di gnyis kyi skabs su lam sgom tshul tsam las /
NK073(pu)007:677: spyi'i lta ba dang 'bras bu'i khyad par ma gsungs pa ni /
NK073(pu)007:678: dgongs pa gong du bstan pa ltar /
NK073(pu)007:679: don dam par skye 'gag med pa dang /
NK073(pu)007:680: kun rdzob sgyu ma yongs su dag pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor du lta ba dang /
NK073(pu)007:681: bden gnyis dbyer med par lta ba dang /
NK073(pu)007:682: 'bras bu bla med kyi byang chub la theg chen
NK073(pu)007:683: thams cad khyad med pas dbye mi dgos so zhes
NK073(pu)007:684: dgongs pa'o // gsum pa rdzogs pa chen po'i tshul ni /
NK073(pu)007:685: de la rdzogs pa chen po ni don dang tshul gnyis las /
NK073(pu)007:686: don ni chos thams cad rang byung gi ye shes
NK073(pu)007:687: byang chub kyi rang bzhin du bstan pa yin la
NK073(pu)007:688: / tshul ni de la 'jug pa'i thabs dang sgo ste /
NK073(pu)007:689: de gnyis mdor bstan par dgongs nas /
NK073(pu)007:690: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kun rdzob dang don dam rang mtshan dang spyi mtshan /
NK073(pu)007:691: dkar po dang nag po sogs 'di dang 'adi'o zhes
NK073(pu)007:692: dbye ba ji snyed pa thams cad rnam dbyer med
NK073(pu)007:693: par te gang du dbyer med na sku gsung thugs
NK073(pu)007:694: kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin du dbyer med de
NK073(pu)007:695: dper na 'jig rten phal pa dang /
NK073(pu)007:696: phyi rol mu stegs can gyis rnam par bzhag pa'i tha snyad kyi mtshan nyid thams cad dang /
NK073(pu)007:697: gang zag gi mtshan nyid thams cad kyang /
NK073(pu)007:698: sangs rgyas pa'i chos su bsdus te bstan pa bzhin no //
NK073(pu)007:699: ji ltar dbyer med na de'i rang bzhin ye nas
NK073(pu)007:700: yin par rtogs nas bsgom pa yin pa'i phyir te
NK073(pu)007:702: de yang rgyud gsang ba snying po las /
NK073(pu)007:703: sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i rang bzhin yin pas rdo rje'i sgras bstan te /
NK073(pu)007:704: rdo rje phung po'i yan lag ni //
NK073(pu)007:705: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags //
NK073(pu)007:706: skye mched khams rnams mang po kun //
NK073(pu)007:707: byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid //
NK073(pu)007:708: sa chu spyan dang m+aa ma k+ai //
NK073(pu)007:709: me rlung gos dkar sgrol ma ste //
NK073(pu)007:710: nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma //
NK073(pu)007:711: srid gsum ye nas rnam par dag /
NK073(pu)007:713: de'i don slob dpon gyis rnam par sbyang bar mdzad pa /
NK073(pu)007:714: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams
NK073(pu)007:715: cad rig pa byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin yin
NK073(pu)007:716: pas ye nas ma skyed la skye med stong pa
NK073(pu)007:717: chen por gnas bzhin snang cha rnams 'gags med du
NK073(pu)007:718: shar ba'i sa sogs rang rang gi bya ba byed
NK073(pu)007:719: nus pa'i sgyu ma rnams bde bar gshegs pa yab
NK073(pu)007:720: yum bcu dang sems dpa' sems ma la stsogs pa'i
NK073(pu)007:721: rang bzhin lam gyis bcos shing bsgyur ba lta bu
NK073(pu)007:722: ma yin par ye nas yin pa'i phyir /
NK073(pu)007:723: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyi mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
NK073(pu)007:724: sa sogs 'byung ba chen po lnga ni yum lnga'i rang bzhin te sa sangs rgyas spyan ma /
NK073(pu)007:729: de bzhin du phung po lnga ni rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas te /
NK073(pu)007:735: rnam par shes pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' bzhi'i rang bzhin te /
NK073(pu)007:739: lce shes spyan ras gzigs so //
NK073(pu)007:740: yul bzhi ni shes bzhir dgyes bskyed mdzes pa'i lha mo bzhi'i rang bzhin te /
NK073(pu)007:745: dbang po bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' bzhi'i rang bzhin te /
NK073(pu)007:750: dus bzhi ni mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi'i rang bzhin te /
NK073(pu)007:751: dus 'das pa ni bdug spos ma /
NK073(pu)007:753: ma 'ongs pa ni snang gsal ma /
NK073(pu)007:754: 'byung bar ma nges pa ni dri chab ma'o //
NK073(pu)007:755: lus kyi dbang po dang rnam par shes pa dang /
NK073(pu)007:756: yul reg bya dag de las byung ba'i reg pa ste /
NK073(pu)007:757: bde chen byang chub kyi sems ni khro bo bzhi'i rang bzhin te /
NK073(pu)007:758: de yang lus dbang gi gsang ba'i rdo rje yul
NK073(pu)007:759: dang phrad pas dbang shes gzhan bcoms shing mi gnas
NK073(pu)007:760: par byed pa'i phyir stobs chen khro bo bzhir bzhag
NK073(pu)007:761: ste / reg pa bdud rtsi 'khyil reg byed kyi lus dbang rta mgrin /
NK073(pu)007:763: reg shes gshin rje gshed do //
NK073(pu)007:764: rtag chad mu bzhi ni khro mo bzhi'i rang bzhin te /
NK073(pu)007:765: rtag par lta ba gnas su dam pa lcags kyu ma /
NK073(pu)007:766: de bzhin du chad par lta ba zhags pa ma /
NK073(pu)007:767: bdag tu lta ba lcags sgrogs ma mtshan mar lta ba dril bu ma'o //
NK073(pu)007:768: yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni byang chub kyi
NK073(pu)007:769: rang bzhin can gyi sems mi phyed pa rdo rje
NK073(pu)007:770: lta bu thams cad du dor bya'i chos med pa'i
NK073(pu)007:771: kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin /
NK073(pu)007:772: yid de'i yul chos 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas
NK073(pu)007:773: ni chos bya ba mo kun tu bzang mo'i rang
NK073(pu)007:774: bzhin te / de dag kyang ye nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin yin gyi /
NK073(pu)007:775: de lam gyis gsar du bsgrub pa ni ma yin no //
NK073(pu)007:776: de ltar rang gi rgyud kyi gzhungs drangs nas /
NK073(pu)007:777: de dang mthun pa'i lung gzhan dag drangs pa'i phyir /
NK073(pu)007:778: dkyil 'khor gsum du snang ba'ang rtsa ba byang chub
NK073(pu)007:779: kyi sems rang byung gi ye shes theg le nyag
NK073(pu)007:780: gcig tu bstan pa de ltar phyogs bcu dus gsum
NK073(pu)007:781: dang khams gsum la sogs pa 'dus byas dang 'dus
NK073(pu)007:782: ma byas pa'i chos thams cad rang gi sems las
NK073(pu)007:783: gud na med de ji skad du /
NK073(pu)007:784: khams gsum rnam rgyal gyi rtogs pa las /
NK073(pu)007:785: rang sems phyin ci ma logs pa'am /
NK073(pu)007:786: blo'i rtsal bzhin du so sor rtogs pa ni /
NK073(pu)007:787: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sogs de nyid do zhes rtogs na sangs rgyas /
NK073(pu)007:788: ma rtogs na 'khor ba'i snod bcud du snang ste 'jig rten gsum po de nyid do //
NK073(pu)007:789: 'byung ba che rnams de nyid do //
NK073(pu)007:791: ji skad du gsang ba 'dus pa las /
NK073(pu)007:792: chos thams cad ni sems la gnas so //
NK073(pu)007:793: zhes cir snang rang sems kyi snang ba tsam du zad la /
NK073(pu)007:794: sems ni nam mkha' la gnas so //
NK073(pu)007:795: zhes sems kyi rang bzhin skye med nam mkha' dang 'dra'o zhes so //
NK073(pu)007:796: nam mkha' ni mtshan nyid thams cad dang bral bas ci la'ang mi gnas so //
NK073(pu)007:799: chos thams cad ni chos can dang chos nyid rnam
NK073(pu)007:800: par sgrub pa dang bral bas 'di la 'dis stong
NK073(pu)007:801: zhes rnam bzhag bral bas ngo bo nyid kyis stong
NK073(pu)007:802: pa'o // chos thams cad ni nyon mongs pa'i dri
NK073(pu)007:803: ma nyid ye nas grub ma myong bas gdod ma
NK073(pu)007:805: chos thams cad ni sgrib pa'i mun pa nyid ye nas ma grub pas yongs kyis 'od gsal ba'o //
NK073(pu)007:806: chos thams cad ni mi mthun pa dang gnyen po
NK073(pu)007:807: gnyis su med pas rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las
NK073(pu)007:808: 'das pa'o // chos thams cad ni sgrib gnyis bri
NK073(pu)007:809: ba dang tshogs gnyis bsags pa bral bas mngon par
NK073(pu)007:813: skabs 'dir rtsa ba'i mchan rnying grub /
NK073(pu)007:814: rdzogs pa chen po'i tshul ni /
NK073(pu)007:815: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs pa /
NK073(pu)007:816: 'bras bu'i chos lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul 'di ni don la 'jug pa'o //
NK073(pu)007:818: gnyis pa la'ang rtogs pa bzhi dang /
NK073(pu)007:821: dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i rim pa ste tshul bzhis bshad de /
NK073(pu)007:822: de yang rtogs pa bzhi yul gyi tshul te mtshan
NK073(pu)007:823: gzhir bzhag mtshan nyid gsum thabs kyi tshul te de'i
NK073(pu)007:825: bsnyen sgrub bzhi ni 'bras bu'i tshul te la bzla ba'i man ngag tu bzhag /
NK073(pu)007:826: lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i tshul ni 'jug rim du bzhag go //
NK073(pu)007:827: de la'ang rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul gnyis ni yul gyi tshul /
NK073(pu)007:828: byin gyis brlabs par rtogs pa ni thabs kyi tshul /
NK073(pu)007:829: mngon sum par rtogs pa ni 'bras bu'i tshul lo //
NK073(pu)007:830: de bzhin du mtshan nyid gsum pa yang /
NK073(pu)007:831: shes pa'i mtshan nyid ni yul gyi tshul /
NK073(pu)007:832: 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid ni thabs kyi tshul /
NK073(pu)007:833: 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid ni 'bras bu'i tshul lo //
NK073(pu)007:835: bsnyen pa ni yul gyi tshul /
NK073(pu)007:836: nye bar bsnyen pa dang sgrub pa ni thabs kyi tshul /
NK073(pu)007:837: sgrub pa chen po ni 'bras bu'i tshul lo //
NK073(pu)007:838: de bzhin du 'jug rim gsum la yang /
NK073(pu)007:839: thos pas mig phye ba ni yul gyi tshul /
NK073(pu)007:840: goms par byed pas dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa ni thabs kyi tshul /
NK073(pu)007:841: goms pa'i mthus mngon du gyur pas dngos grub chen po thob pa ni 'bras bu'i tshul lo //
NK073(pu)007:842: de ltar nges par byas nas /
NK073(pu)007:844: tshogs gnyis rdzogs pas rdzogs pa zhes bya la /
NK073(pu)007:845: de yang theg pa 'og ma ltar bgrod cing sbyang ba la ltos pa ma yin gyi /
NK073(pu)007:846: sku gsung thugs 'bras bu'i chos su gdod nas lhun
NK073(pu)007:847: gyis grub pas chen po'i ste de'i don la 'jug
NK073(pu)007:848: pa'i thabs dang sgo ni tshul te //
NK073(pu)007:849: de ni rtogs pa rnam pa bzhi'i lam gyi yid ches par bya dgos te /
NK073(pu)007:851: rtsa rgyud le'u bcu gcig pa las /
NK073(pu)007:852: rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul //
NK073(pu)007:853: byin gyis rlabs dang mngon sum pa //
NK073(pu)007:854: rab tu rtogs pa rnam bzhi yis //
NK073(pu)007:855: thams cad mngon rdzogs rgyal po che //
NK073(pu)007:857: rgyu gcig par rtogs pa dang //
NK073(pu)007:858: yig 'bru'i tshul gyi rtogs pa dang /
NK073(pu)007:859: byin gyis rlabs kyis rtogs pa dang /
NK073(pu)007:861: de yang rtogs pa bzhi 'di la rim cig car
NK073(pu)007:862: gnyis kyi bshad pa 'byung yang 'dir rdzogs pa chen
NK073(pu)007:863: po rang byung gi ye shes thig le nyag gcig
NK073(pu)007:864: tu gtan la phebs pas cig char ba ltar du
NK073(pu)007:865: bshad de / de la rgyu ste rang bzhin nam
NK073(pu)007:866: gzhi gcig par rtogs pa ni chos thams cad don
NK073(pu)007:867: dam par ma skyes pas zhes ma skyes pa'i rang
NK073(pu)007:868: bzhin du so so ma yin pa dang /
NK073(pu)007:869: kun rdzob tu snang ba bden stong sgyu ma'i mtshan
NK073(pu)007:870: nyid du so so ma yin pa ni theg pa
NK073(pu)007:871: chen po thun mong du grags pa dang /
NK073(pu)007:872: ma skyes pa nyid ma skyes bzhin du chu zla
NK073(pu)007:873: ltar rgyu dag ma dag sna tshogs su snang zhing
NK073(pu)007:874: rang rang gi bya ba byed nus pa dang /
NK073(pu)007:875: sgyu ma ltar snang ba nyid snang bzhin du'ang ngo
NK073(pu)007:876: bo med de ma skyes pas na kun rdzob dang
NK073(pu)007:877: don dam par dbyer med pas zung 'jug rang byung
NK073(pu)007:878: gi ye shes rgyu gcig par rtogs pa ni lung
NK073(pu)007:879: zab mo las grags pa'i thun mong ma yin pa'o
NK073(pu)007:880: // mdor na rang byung ye shes byang chub sems
NK073(pu)007:881: kyi ngo bo ni snang stong dbyer med phyed pa'i
NK073(pu)007:883: 'khor 'das thams cad de'i tshul gcig las mi 'da' ba ni rgyu gcig pa'o //
NK073(pu)007:884: yig 'bru'i tshul gyis rtogs pa ni /
NK073(pu)007:885: de lta bu'i snang stong dbyer med kyi rang bzhin
NK073(pu)007:886: de nyid kyang gdod ma nas sku gsung thugs 'bras
NK073(pu)007:887: bu'i chos su sangs rgyas par bstan pa ste /
NK073(pu)007:888: de la chos thams cad ma skyes pa ni a yis mtshon te gsung gi rang bzhin /
NK073(pu)007:889: ma skyes pa nyid sgyu mar snang zhing bya ba
NK073(pu)007:890: byed nus pa ni o yis mtshon te sku'i rang
NK073(pu)007:891: bzhin / de ltar rtogs pa'i rig pa sgyu ma'i
NK073(pu)007:892: ye shes mtha' dbus med pa ni gyis mtshon te
NK073(pu)007:893: thugs kyi rang bzhin du rtogs pa'o //
NK073(pu)007:894: de yang gdod nas snang stong zung 'jug gi ye
NK073(pu)007:895: shes de la bsal bzhag gi bri gang nam yang
NK073(pu)007:896: med cing / de nyid rang bzhin rnam par dag pa 'khor ba ye sangs chen po yin la /
NK073(pu)007:897: de nyid kyi rol pa ni gdod nas dkyil 'khor
NK073(pu)007:898: gsum du gnas pa yin par ni yig 'bru'i tshul
NK073(pu)007:899: gyis rtogs pa'o // byin gyis rlabs kyi rtogs pa ni /
NK073(pu)007:900: rtogs pa rnam pa gnyis po de'i mthu dang byin rlabs shes pa ste /
NK073(pu)007:901: dper na ras dkar po la dmar por byin gyis rlobs pa'i mthu btsod la yod pa bzhin du /
NK073(pu)007:902: chos thams cad gdod ma nas sangs rgyas par byin
NK073(pu)007:903: gyis rlobs pa'i mthu yang rgyu gcig pa dang yig
NK073(pu)007:904: 'bru'i tshul gyi mthus byin gyis rlobs par shes shing
NK073(pu)007:905: rtogs pa'o // de la chos thams cad ye nas
NK073(pu)007:906: sangs rgyas pa yin mod kyi rtogs pa gnyis dang
NK073(pu)007:909: de gnyis dang ldan na ni phan thogs par snang bar 'gyur bas /
NK073(pu)007:910: rtogs pa gnyis kyi mthus chos thams cad ye nas
NK073(pu)007:911: sangs rgyas par byin gyis rlob sa pa ltar snang
NK073(pu)007:912: bar 'gyur pas byin gyis rlob par rtogs pa zhes
NK073(pu)007:913: bya'o // mngon sum par rtogs pa ni /
NK073(pu)007:914: spyi dbang po'i mngon sum sogs yod kyang 'dir shes rab kyi dbang po'i mngon sum ste /
NK073(pu)007:915: de yang so sor rtogs pa'i shes rab nyid la go bar bya ste /
NK073(pu)007:916: chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas par gnas pa
NK073(pu)007:917: de yang yid ches pa'i lung dang bla ma brgyud
NK073(pu)007:918: pa'i man ngag dang 'gal ba'ang ma yin pa ste
NK073(pu)007:919: / dper na bsreg bcad brdar bas gser yin min /
NK073(pu)007:920: yod med gser bzang ngan shes pa bzhin du /
NK073(pu)007:922: lung la drang nges ldem dgongs sna tshogs pa la man ngag gis de'i skyon bsal bas yid ches /
NK073(pu)007:923: lung dang man ngag yid kyang tshig tsam gyi sgra
NK073(pu)007:924: phyir 'brang bas blo'i gting du nyams su ma lon
NK073(pu)007:926: lung dang man ngag gi tshig tsam la brten pa'ang
NK073(pu)007:927: ma yin par so sor rtogs pa'i shes rab bam
NK073(pu)007:928: rang gi rig pas blo'i gting du yid ches pas
NK073(pu)007:930: zhes 'dis ni lung gis don spyi phyin ci ma log pa shes par 'gyur la /
NK073(pu)007:931: man ngag gis lung gi dgongs pa gzhan du 'dren pa gcod cing /
NK073(pu)007:932: shes rab kyis mngon sum du rtogs pas thos pa
NK073(pu)007:933: tsam la sogs pa nyid du zhan pa sel zhing
NK073(pu)007:934: gcod par byed pa yin no //
NK073(pu)007:935: de ltar lam gyis yid ches pa ni /
NK073(pu)007:936: rtogs pa rnam bzhi'i don de nyid shes shing rig pa nyid rnal 'byor ba'i lam ste /
NK073(pu)007:937: de'ang mtshan nyid theg par rgyu sngon du bsgrubs pa'i
NK073(pu)007:938: 'bras bu sangs rgyas nyid phyis nam zhig na 'byung
NK073(pu)007:939: ba'i dus la ltos pa lta bu ma yin gyis
NK073(pu)007:940: / da lta nyid du shes rab kyi dbang pos
NK073(pu)007:941: rang gis mngon sum du rtogs shing yid ches pa'o
NK073(pu)007:943: de la shes pa dang 'jug pa dang mngon du
NK073(pu)007:944: gyur pa ste mtshan nyid gsum gyi ji ltar rtogs
NK073(pu)007:945: pa'i rdzogs pa chen po'i don mthar phyin par 'gyur
NK073(pu)007:947: rtogs pa bzhi'i tshul rig pa ni gtan la dbab bya rgyu shes pa'i mtshan nyid do //
NK073(pu)007:948: yang nas yang du de la goms par byed pa ni rkyen 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid do //
NK073(pu)007:949: de ltar goms pa'i mthus don ji ltar ba bzhin
NK073(pu)007:950: mngon du gyur pa ni mthar phyin 'bras bu'i mtshan
NK073(pu)007:951: nyid do // de la rgyu shes pa'i mtshan nyid lta ba dang /
NK073(pu)007:952: rkyen 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid sgom pa dang mngon du
NK073(pu)007:953: gyur pa 'bras bu'i tshul gsum po 'dis don mthar
NK073(pu)007:954: phyin par byed pas na 'di dang mi ldan du
NK073(pu)007:956: mtshan nyid gsum gyis 'brel ba dang /
NK073(pu)007:958: dgos pa'i yang dgos pa ston te /
NK073(pu)007:960: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i
NK073(pu)007:961: chos su btags pa thams cad yig 'bru'i tshul gyis
NK073(pu)007:962: ye nas sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid dang /
NK073(pu)007:963: rgyu gcig par rtogs pas rang bzhin gyis sangs rgyas
NK073(pu)007:964: pa'i dbyings dang byin gyis brlabs par rtogs pa dang
NK073(pu)007:965: mngon sum par rtogs pa'i don gyis byin gyis rlobs
NK073(pu)007:966: pa'i don mngon sum du rtogs pa ni rgyu shes
NK073(pu)007:968: de ni gang dang 'brel na bla na med pa'i
NK073(pu)007:969: sangs rgyas su 'grub pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir don
NK073(pu)007:970: du 'brel ba'o // dgos pa ni 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid de /
NK073(pu)007:971: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i chos dang /
NK073(pu)007:973: bdud rtsi lnga dang gnyen po lnga dang dug lnga
NK073(pu)007:974: la sogs par brtags pa gtsang mi gtsang dang dag
NK073(pu)007:975: ma dag thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i rang
NK073(pu)007:976: bzhin yin pas mnyam pa chen po la blang dor
NK073(pu)007:977: med par spyod pa ni 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid do
NK073(pu)007:978: // de ltar zhugs pa de ni gang gi phyir
NK073(pu)007:979: dgos zhe na bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas su
NK073(pu)007:980: 'grub pa'i rgyu thun min te blang dor mnyam nyid
NK073(pu)007:981: du ma rtogs par sangs rgyas pa'i thabs yod pa
NK073(pu)007:982: ma yin pa'i phyir dgos pa'o //
NK073(pu)007:983: dgos pa'i yang dgos pa ni 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid de /
NK073(pu)007:984: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
NK073(pu)007:985: rnam par byang ba'i chos spyi dang /
NK073(pu)007:986: sman lnga dang bdun rtsi lnga sogs spyod bya khyad
NK073(pu)007:987: par du btags pa thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas
NK073(pu)007:988: pa'i mnyam pa chen po'i ngang du blang dor med
NK073(pu)007:989: par lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir /
NK073(pu)007:990: srid pa'i 'khor ba nyid ye nas bla na med
NK073(pu)007:991: par sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin mya ngan las 'das
NK073(pu)007:992: pa'i mtshan nyid du lhun gyis grub pa mngon du
NK073(pu)007:993: gyur pa yin pa'i phyir 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid de
NK073(pu)007:994: / sku gsung thugs dus rtag khyab tu mi zad
NK073(pu)007:995: pa rgyan gyi zhes chos kyi dbyings gang bar ye
NK073(pu)007:996: shes kyi rol pa tshad med pa ste /
NK073(pu)007:997: dpe gser mig g.yus spras pa ltar dang /
NK073(pu)007:998: 'khor lo zhes gdul bya'i rgyud la 'jug cing sgrib pa rnams gcod par byed pa ste /
NK073(pu)007:999: de lta bu mngon sum du gyur pa ni dgos pa'i yang dgos pa'o //
NK073(pu)007:1000: de la rdzogs pa chen po ye nas sangs rgyas
NK073(pu)007:1001: pa la rgyu rkyen 'bras bur bzhag pa mi 'gal
NK073(pu)007:1002: lam zhe na / de ltar ma h+aa sogs theg
NK073(pu)007:1003: pa 'og ma'i gzhung gis lam bsnyen sgrub yan lag
NK073(pu)007:1004: bzhi'i sgo nas 'bras bu 'grub par 'dod la /
NK073(pu)007:1005: skabs 'dir ni de ltar bya mi dgos te /
NK073(pu)007:1006: bsnyen sgrub rnam pa bzhi yang brtsal med lhun grub pa'i rnal 'byor la rdzogs pas /
NK073(pu)007:1007: rgyu rkyen 'bras bur gyur pa'i dngos por dngos su
NK073(pu)007:1008: na med do zhes la bzla ba'i man ngag du
NK073(pu)007:1009: sbyar ro // des na shes pa'i yul dang /
NK073(pu)007:1011: de mngon du gyur pa gsum ni chos nyid byang
NK073(pu)007:1012: chub sems kyi rang bzhin la khyad par med pas
NK073(pu)007:1013: gzhi 'bras dbyer med rang bzhin lhun grub chen po'o
NK073(pu)007:1018: sgrub pa chen po'i don te bsnyen sgrub yan lag
NK073(pu)007:1019: bzhi po yang rtsol ba med par lhun gyis grub
NK073(pu)007:1020: par gyur pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o //
NK073(pu)007:1022: de la ma h+aa yo ga'i bsnyen sgrub bzhi las
NK073(pu)007:1023: rdzogs pa chen por la bzla ba'i tshul rgyu 'bras
NK073(pu)007:1024: su gyur pa'i 'byung ba dang phung po'am /
NK073(pu)007:1027: snang stong dbyer med sogs yab yum gyi char snang
NK073(pu)007:1028: ba thams cad la rang bzhin rtsol med lhun grub
NK073(pu)007:1029: kyi tshul du sbyor dgos te /
NK073(pu)007:1031: gzhi ka dang dang lhun grub zung du 'jug pa'i byang chub kyi sems shes pa ste /
NK073(pu)007:1032: de yang kun byang gi chos thams cad ye nas
NK073(pu)007:1033: sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin du lam gyis gsar du
NK073(pu)007:1034: sgrub cing gnyen pos bcos su med par rtogs pa'o
NK073(pu)007:1036: lta ba de'i ngang nas phung po lnga'i rang bzhin can bdag nyid lhar shes pa ste /
NK073(pu)007:1037: de'ang chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin yin pas /
NK073(pu)007:1038: bdag nyid kyang ye nas lha'i rang bzhin yin gyis /
NK073(pu)007:1039: ma h+aa sogs kyi lta ba'i ngang nas bdag lhar
NK073(pu)007:1040: bskyed pa ltar da lta bsgrub pa ni ma yin
NK073(pu)007:1041: par rtogs pa'o // sgrub pa ni yum bskyed pa ste /
NK073(pu)007:1042: de'ang ma h+aa sogs kyi yum bskyed pa lta bu
NK073(pu)007:1043: min gyi yum chen mo nam mkha'i dbyings la las
NK073(pu)007:1044: / nam mkha' nyid yum chen mo sa chu me rlung bzhir snang zhing /
NK073(pu)007:1049: g.yo ba'i bya ba byed pa'i yum ye nas yin par rtogs pa'o //
NK073(pu)007:1051: thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba ste /
NK073(pu)007:1053: yum 'byung ba chen po lnga'i rang bzhin med pa'i
NK073(pu)007:1054: shes rab dang yum gyi mkha' stong pa nyid kyi
NK073(pu)007:1056: ma 'gags par snang ba'i phung po lnga'i sangs rgyas
NK073(pu)007:1057: thams cad kyi yab smon pa med pa'i rnam par
NK073(pu)007:1058: da lta lam gyis zung du sprel ba lta bu
NK073(pu)007:1059: min par ye nas zung du gyur pa'i 'brel pa
NK073(pu)007:1060: las / byang chub sems su dbyer med pa'i rang
NK073(pu)007:1061: bzhin las skye mched thams cad sras spul pa lcam
NK073(pu)007:1062: dral du gyur pa'i rang bzhin ni /
NK073(pu)007:1063: ma h+aa sogs kyi yab yum 'brel ba'i byang chub
NK073(pu)007:1064: sems la sras lcam dral 'phro ba lta bu ma
NK073(pu)007:1065: yin te ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i don la /
NK073(pu)007:1066: yul chos kyi dbyings yum sgyu ma lta bu la
NK073(pu)007:1067: rig pa'i ye shes yab sgyu ma lta bur rol
NK073(pu)007:1068: cing de la ma 'gags mi dmigs dbyer med phyogs
NK073(pu)007:1069: zhen thams cad dang bral ba'i bde ba'i ye shes
NK073(pu)007:1070: cir yang 'char ba rol mo lta bu'i dgongs pa
NK073(pu)007:1072: gnyis 'dzin gyi zhen pa rdul phran tsam yang med
NK073(pu)007:1073: pas ye shes dgyes pa de ni bde ba'i mchog
NK073(pu)007:1074: yin pa de 'dra ba'i sgyu ma'i rgyun la rol
NK073(pu)007:1075: zhing nyams su myong ba'i tshul gyis te /
NK073(pu)007:1076: de yang skad cig ma dang bral ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi rgyu nam mkha' lta bu'o //
NK073(pu)007:1077: bde ba'i dus nyid na spros pa kun bral mtshan
NK073(pu)007:1078: ma med pa'i rnam thar gyi don mthar gang du'ang
NK073(pu)007:1079: mi dmigs shing mkha' dang snyoms pa /
NK073(pu)007:1080: btang snyoms chen po'i ra ba las mi 'da' ba
NK073(pu)007:1081: ni chos nyid rang byung gi ye shes nyag gcig
NK073(pu)007:1082: gi klong du gyur nas byed stsol med par lhun
NK073(pu)007:1084: de la zag pa'i rgyu gzung 'dzin rang byung gi
NK073(pu)007:1085: ye shes su dag cing mi 'gag par ngo bo
NK073(pu)007:1086: nyid kyi rgyun snang ba bsod nams kyi tshogs dang
NK073(pu)007:1087: / de yang spros mtshan 'dzin zhen cung zad kyang med pa ye shes kyi tshogs so //
NK073(pu)007:1088: de lta bu'i tshogs gnyis lhun gyis grub pa rang
NK073(pu)007:1089: byung gi ye shes chen po des bdun rnam pa
NK073(pu)007:1090: bzhi'am brtul nas mthar phyin pa'i don 'grub pa'o //
NK073(pu)007:1091: de la bdud bzhi brtul tshul ni /
NK073(pu)007:1092: bsnyen pa byang chub kyi sems shes pa'i mtshan nyid
NK073(pu)007:1093: ma skyes pa'i ting 'dzin gyi 'chi bdag gi bdud
NK073(pu)007:1094: bcom / nyer bsnyen bdag nyid lhar shes pa'i mtshan
NK073(pu)007:1095: nyid sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis phung po'i
NK073(pu)007:1096: bcom / bdud bcom / sgrub pa yum bskyed pa'i
NK073(pu)007:1097: mtshan nyid rdul dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis
NK073(pu)007:1099: sgrub pa chen po thabs shes zung du 'brel mtshan
NK073(pu)007:1100: nyid mi dmigs mkha' dang snyoms pa'i ting nge 'dzin
NK073(pu)007:1101: gyis lha bu'i bdud bar chad g.yengs pa'i bdud bcom
NK073(pu)007:1102: / de ltar na gang la bdud rnam pa bzhi
NK073(pu)007:1103: 'dul bar byed pa'i mthu yod pa'i lam de ni
NK073(pu)007:1104: rnam par dag pa'i lam yin la /
NK073(pu)007:1105: de yang brtsal ba med par lhun gyis grub pa'i lam chen po'o //
NK073(pu)007:1107: rdzogs pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i rim pa ste /
NK073(pu)007:1108: de yang theg pa 'og ma ltar dkyil 'khor bzhengs
NK073(pu)007:1109: bkod sogs kyi rtsol ba la ltos pa ma yin
NK073(pu)007:1110: te / chos thams cad gdod ma nas rnam par
NK073(pu)007:1111: dag pa'i sgyu 'phrul 'dod dgur 'jo ba yid bzhin
NK073(pu)007:1112: gyi gzhal yas khang phyogs dus kyi rnam pas rgya
NK073(pu)007:1113: yongs su ma chad pa'i 'khor lo ye nas bla
NK073(pu)007:1114: na med pa'i ste rdul tshon sogs dang gzugs brnyan
NK073(pu)007:1115: thams cad las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'ang
NK073(pu)007:1116: ye sangs rgyas pa'i don rtogs byed gsang snying le'u
NK073(pu)007:1117: bcu gsum pa man ngag dang bcas pa rdzogs chen
NK073(pu)007:1118: sogs thabs kyi theg pa'i gzhung rnams thog mar nyan
NK073(pu)007:1119: pa'i shes rab kyis bla ma las thos pa ni
NK073(pu)007:1120: te / mig phye ba'o // bsam pa'i shes rab
NK073(pu)007:1121: kyis de'i don rtogs pa ni dkyil 'khor mthong ba'o
NK073(pu)007:1122: te / mig phye ba'o // // sgom pa'i shes
NK073(pu)007:1123: rab kyis rtogs nas goms par byed pa ni dkyil
NK073(pu)007:1124: 'khor du zhugs pa ste dbang bskur thob pa'o //
NK073(pu)007:1125: de ltar zhugs nas mngon du gyur pa ni dngos grub chen po thob pa'o //
NK073(pu)007:1126: da ni rdzogs pa chen po'i tshul 'di kun gyi
NK073(pu)007:1127: thun mong ma yin par ston pa'i phyir gsungs pa
NK073(pu)007:1128: / de ltar tshul 'di ni mnyam nyid rdzogs pa
NK073(pu)007:1129: chen po rgyu 'bras kyi theg pa thams cad mthar
NK073(pu)007:1130: phyin pa ste de las gong du bgrod du med
NK073(pu)007:1131: / pa'i don to // lam 'di'i 'bras bu ni
NK073(pu)007:1132: yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen gyi sa la brtsal
NK073(pu)007:1134: de yang spyir mtshan nyid kyi theg pa spyi las
NK073(pu)007:1135: sangs rgyas kyi sa kun tu 'od ces bya ste
NK073(pu)007:1136: / 'di ltar 'od zer mang po bkye bas 'dul
NK073(pu)007:1137: ba'i 'gro ba snod du rung bar mdzad pa'i phyir
NK073(pu)007:1139: rdo rje theg pa spyi las ni sangs rgyas kyi sa gsum du grags te /
NK073(pu)007:1140: de la kun tu 'od ni chos kyi sku mtshan
NK073(pu)007:1141: ma med pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bas kun
NK073(pu)007:1142: la khyab pa'o // pad+ma can ni dmigs pa med
NK073(pu)007:1143: pa'i shes rab kyis chos kyi sku'i don cir yang
NK073(pu)007:1144: ma gzigs pa nyid ma chags pa'i thugs rje'i gzhi
NK073(pu)007:1145: la khyab pa'o // yin pa'o // yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen ni /
NK073(pu)007:1146: de nyid kyi dus ye shes dang mtshan ma'i dkyil
NK073(pu)007:1147: 'khor gyi bdag nyid brtsal ba med par lhun gyis
NK073(pu)007:1148: grub pa ste / de la yi ge ni gnyis te /
NK073(pu)007:1150: mtshan ma la'ang gnyis te ming dang gzugs so //
NK073(pu)007:1151: gzugs kyang rnam pa gnyis te /
NK073(pu)007:1152: yongs su rdzogs pa dang cha shas su snang ba'o //
NK073(pu)007:1153: 'di lta bu'i 'bras bu'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi
NK073(pu)007:1154: tshogs chen por lhun gyis grub pa ni yi ge
NK073(pu)007:1155: 'khor lo tshogs chen gyis zhes kyang bya /
NK073(pu)007:1156: sangs rgyas kyi sa bcu gsum pa zhes kyang bya'o //
NK073(pu)007:1157: de ni skyes bu blo rtsal rab kyi ye nas
NK073(pu)007:1158: sangs rgyas pa'i don la ye nas sangs rgyas par
NK073(pu)007:1159: rig nas lam gyi bya rtsol la mi ltos par
NK073(pu)007:1160: skad cig gis goms pa drag brdal te cig char
NK073(pu)007:1162: gang zag phal gyi bsam zhing goms par bya ba ni ma yin no //
NK073(pu)007:1163: skye bo phal gyis 'di lta bu'i don thos te
NK073(pu)007:1164: nan tan du ji ltar bsams kyang don 'di ni
NK073(pu)007:1165: bden zhing ches zab par yid ches par mi 'gyur
NK073(pu)007:1166: ro // yid ches pa dang phal gyi blo la
NK073(pu)007:1167: go dka' zhing bden pa dang zab par ma shes
NK073(pu)007:1168: pa'i dbang gis rang gi nyams dang sbyar nas gang
NK073(pu)007:1169: zag gzhan kun kyang de dang 'dra snyoms nas yongs
NK073(pu)007:1170: te rdzogs pa chen po rtogs pa rnams dang chos
NK073(pu)007:1171: thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa ni rdzun zhes
NK073(pu)007:1172: skyes bu rab rnams la skur pa 'debs shing theg
NK073(pu)007:1173: pa chen po sun 'byin pa'i blo skye bar 'gyur
NK073(pu)007:1174: bas rab tu gsang par bya dgos pa'i phyir yang
NK073(pu)007:1175: rang bzhin gsang ba'i theg pa zhes ston pa nyid
NK073(pu)007:1177: de bas na chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas
NK073(pu)007:1178: pa'i don la ji bzhin par rtogs nus pa'i blo
NK073(pu)007:1179: ma skyes par du theg ba 'og ma bas zhes
NK073(pu)007:1180: lha mi nyan rang sogs kyi lam gyis 'gro ba'i
NK073(pu)007:1181: don byas na gdul bya rnams kyi rgyud chud mi
NK073(pu)007:1182: za bas na / slob dpon gyis blo dman rnams la 'khor ba'i skyon dang /
NK073(pu)007:1183: mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan la basngagasa pa dang /
NK073(pu)007:1184: theg pa thams cad kyi rim pa mtha' dag la mkhas par bya ba dang /
NK073(pu)007:1185: de'i don slob ma'i nyams dang sbyar la rim pas drang bar bya ba yin gyi /
NK073(pu)007:1186: theg pa'i phyogs 'ga' mi shes pas slob dpon gyis
NK073(pu)007:1187: bzung du mi rung bar mdo rgyud dag na rgya
NK073(pu)007:1190: rgyas par bshad pa gnyis las /
NK073(pu)007:1192: de ltar lta ba'i khyad par gyis yon tan gyi
NK073(pu)007:1193: 'bras bu 'dod pa'i phyir lus kyi dka' thub dang
NK073(pu)007:1194: rang gi ngang tshul snga ma'i gnas skabs las gzhan
NK073(pu)007:1195: du bsgyur ba'i spyod pa brtul zhugs kyang mi 'dra
NK073(pu)007:1196: ba'i bye brag tu 'gyur te lta ba mig dang
NK073(pu)007:1197: 'dra bas ji ltar bcad pa bzhin du /
NK073(pu)007:1198: dka' thub dang brtul zhugs rkang pa 'dra ba rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
NK073(pu)007:1199: de la lta ba'i bye brag gis dka' thub yod med gnyis su 'gyur te /
NK073(pu)007:1200: dka' thub med pa ni gnyis te /
NK073(pu)007:1201: lta ba la sgyub bya med pa'i dbang gis 'jig rten phyal ba dang phyi rol mur thug go //
NK073(pu)007:1202: gang lta ba la sgrub par bya ba yod pa'i
NK073(pu)007:1203: dbang gis dka' thub yod pa ni rnam pa bzhi
NK073(pu)007:1204: ste / 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa dang phyi rol
NK073(pu)007:1205: mu stegs pa ste thar pa'i lam dang rjes su
NK073(pu)007:1206: ma 'brel ba 'jig rten gyi dka' thub dang //
NK073(pu)007:1207: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam du gyur pa nyan
NK073(pu)007:1208: thos kyi dka' thub dang byang chub sems dpa'i dka'
NK073(pu)007:1209: thub dang / bla na med pa'i dka' thub bo //
NK073(pu)007:1211: de la gong du lta ba'i skabs su smos pa'i
NK073(pu)007:1212: 'jig rten phyal ba ni rgyu dang 'bras bu la
NK073(pu)007:1213: rmongs pa'i phyir blang dor gyi gnas ci yang mi
NK073(pu)007:1214: shes pas dka' thub med pa'o //
NK073(pu)007:1215: phyi rol mur thug pa ni rgyu 'bras chad par
NK073(pu)007:1216: lta ba'i phyir tshe phyi ma la phan pa don
NK073(pu)007:1217: du mi gnyer bas dka' thub med pa'o //
NK073(pu)007:1218: de gnyis ni dka' thub med pa ste /
NK073(pu)007:1219: dka' thub yod pa'i phyogs la //
NK073(pu)007:1220: 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa ni tshe 'di'i btsan phyugs
NK073(pu)007:1221: sogs gzhan las khyad par du 'phags pa bsgrubs pa'i
NK073(pu)007:1222: phyir gtsang sbra la sogs pa'i dka' thub can no
NK073(pu)007:1223: // phyi rol mu stegs pa ni /
NK073(pu)007:1224: bdag rtag pa zhig yod pa de dag par bya ba'i phyir /
NK073(pu)007:1225: tsha grang sogs kyis sun 'byin cing phyogs bzhir me
NK073(pu)007:1226: dang steng nas nyi ma ste me lnga brten pa
NK073(pu)007:1227: la sogs pa'i dka' thub dang /
NK073(pu)007:1228: khyi phag sogs kyi rtul zhugs dman pa ngal ba don med phyin ci log par spyod pa'o //
NK073(pu)007:1229: nyan thos kyi dka' thub ni 'dul ba las /
NK073(pu)007:1230: bslab pa gsum mdor bsdus te /
NK073(pu)007:1231: sdig pa ci yang mi bya ste /
NK073(pu)007:1232: zhes tshul khrims kyi bslab pa'i dbang du byas te /
NK073(pu)007:1233: mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam las kyang /
NK073(pu)007:1238: rdzun smra lta bu pham par gyur pa'i chos bzhi sogs bya ba ma yin pa las ldog pa'o //
NK073(pu)007:1239: dge ba phun sum tshogs par spyad /
NK073(pu)007:1240: ces shes rab kyi bslab pa'i dbang du byas te
NK073(pu)007:1241: bden pa bzhi'i don phyin ci ma log par rtogs
NK073(pu)007:1242: pa'i shes rab kyis bsdus pa /
NK073(pu)007:1243: 'phags pa'i lam dang 'bras bu'i chos spyad cing thob par bya ba rnams so //
NK073(pu)007:1244: rang gi sems ni yongs su 'dul /
NK073(pu)007:1245: zhes sems kyi bslab pa'i dbang du byas te sems
NK073(pu)007:1246: phyir rol gyi g.yengs ba las bzlog te rtse gcig
NK073(pu)007:1247: mnyam par bzhag pa'i bsam gtan la bslab pa'o //
NK073(pu)007:1248: tshul 'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa yin /
NK073(pu)007:1249: zhes tshad mar byed pa'i tshig ste /
NK073(pu)007:1250: phyir rol dbang phyug sogs kyi lung dang mi 'dra ste /
NK073(pu)007:1251: kun gyis yid brtan du rung ba'i tshad ma sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa /
NK073(pu)007:1252: dam pa'i chos 'dul ba legs par gsungs pa yin no //
NK073(pu)007:1254: de'i dbang gis dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos
NK073(pu)007:1255: thams cad kun rdzoob dang don dam par gnyis ka
NK073(pu)007:1256: yod par lta ba dang zhes 'di ltar kun rdzob
NK073(pu)007:1257: kyi shes pa la snang ba'i chos gang dag /
NK073(pu)007:1258: don dam pa'i shes pa la'ang snang ste /
NK073(pu)007:1259: de bas na gnyis kar yod pa zhes bya'o //
NK073(pu)007:1260: de'i dbang gis lus ngag gis dge ba ni spyod /
NK073(pu)007:1261: mi dge ba ni spongs pa'i dka' thub dang brtul zhugs la spyod pa'o //
NK073(pu)007:1262: gong du rang sangs rgyas lta ba'i skabs su gud du bzhag nas /
NK073(pu)007:1263: 'dir dka' thub ma smos pa ni nyan thos dang mthun pa'i phyir ro //
NK073(pu)007:1264: byang chub sems dpa'i dka' thub ni /
NK073(pu)007:1265: sems can thams cad 'a khor mtsho las bsgral ba'i phyir /
NK073(pu)007:1266: thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes kyi sems bskyed pa ni sdom pa'i dngos gzhi yin la /
NK073(pu)007:1267: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de ma thob par
NK073(pu)007:1268: sems can gyi don byed mi nus pas de thob
NK073(pu)007:1269: par bya na rgyu ni byang chub kyi sems /
NK073(pu)007:1270: rtsa ba snying rje chen po /
NK073(pu)007:1271: mthar phyin pa thabs la mkhas pa ste /
NK073(pu)007:1272: 'di gsum ni mi tshang mi rung ngo //
NK073(pu)007:1273: de'i mi mthun phyogs rang bzhin gyi kha na ma tho ba //
NK073(pu)007:1274: byang sems la pham pa bzhi ste /
NK073(pu)007:1275: byang chub kyi sems gtong ba ni byang sems yongs
NK073(pu)007:1276: gzung gi mi mthun phyogs dang ser sna'i dbang gis
NK073(pu)007:1277: sems can mi skyob pa dang /
NK073(pu)007:1278: gnod sems kyis sems can la gnod pa byed pa
NK073(pu)007:1279: gnyis ni snying rje'i mi mthun phyogs dang dam pa'i
NK073(pu)007:1280: chos spong ba ni thabs mkhas kyi mi mthun phyogs
NK073(pu)007:1281: te / de bzhis ma zin par snying rjes zin
NK073(pu)007:1282: na lus ngag gis tshar gcod pa yang bya dgos
NK073(pu)007:1283: te / te / byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa nyi shu pa las /
NK073(pu)007:1284: byang chub sems dpas tshar bcad pa'i las kyis 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rkyen du 'tshams par 'gyur yang /
NK073(pu)007:1285: tshang gcod pa'i las kyis 'gro ba'i don mi byed na yang nyams par 'gyur ro //
NK073(pu)007:1286: rdzu 'phrul bstan pas brid pa dang spyo ba dang
NK073(pu)007:1287: bsdigs pa la sogs pa sbyor ba dam pa min
NK073(pu)007:1288: pas 'dul kyang de ltar mi byed na yang nyams
NK073(pu)007:1290: bsam pa snying rjer ldan zhing byams pa'i phyir dang /
NK073(pu)007:1291: sems dge ba la sbyor ba rtsub kyang nyes pa med /
NK073(pu)007:1293: kun slong snying rje chen pos zin na chos thams cad dge ba dang /
NK073(pu)007:1294: ltar snang mi dge ba gang spyad kyang byang sems kyi sdom pa nyams par mi 'gyur te /
NK073(pu)007:1295: byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa ni mdor na snying rje chen pos gzhi bzung nas spyod do //
NK073(pu)007:1296: gsang ba bla na med pa'i dka' thub ni /
NK073(pu)007:1297: dam tshig chen po'i mod nyid las //
NK073(pu)007:1298: thabs shes mnyam pa chen po bla na med pa
NK073(pu)007:1299: sangs rgyas kyi theg par blo rab tu nges pa'am
NK073(pu)007:1302: 'dod yon lnga kun la spyad kyang /
NK073(pu)007:1303: pad+ma la ni 'dam gyis mi gos pa bzhin te /
NK073(pu)007:1304: gang zag mchog de la nyan thos kyi tshul khrims
NK073(pu)007:1305: dang byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa thams cad kyang
NK073(pu)007:1308: chos thams cad ye nas mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir /
NK073(pu)007:1309: de la snying rje ni ye ldan yin pas 'bras bu mi rung bas bsten du med la /
NK073(pu)007:1310: zhe sdang ni rang mtshan pa med pas spang du med de ye nas mnyam nyid yin pa'i phyir /
NK073(pu)007:1311: de lta bu'i mnyam nyid kyi blos zin na ci yang mi 'gal lo zhes dgongs pa'o //
NK073(pu)007:1312: mdor na nyan thos kyi sdom pa ni sems can la gnod sbyor las log pa'o //
NK073(pu)007:1313: byang sems kyi sdom pa ni /
NK073(pu)007:1314: de'i steng du phan 'dogs la zhugs so //
NK073(pu)007:1315: gsang sngags kyi sdom pa ni de gnyis kyi steng
NK073(pu)007:1316: du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad spyod nyams su blang
NK073(pu)007:1317: ste spyod pa'o // gzhan yang nyan thos kyi sdom
NK073(pu)007:1318: pa ni 'du shes dang dngos gzhi'i sgo nas las
NK073(pu)007:1320: byang sems ni snying rje gtso bo yin zhing /
NK073(pu)007:1321: gsang sngags ni shes rab gtso bo yin par 'dod do //
NK073(pu)007:1323: sngon gyi 'phags pa dgra bcom pa rnams kyi rjes su slob cing /
NK073(pu)007:1324: byang sems ni sa chen po la gnas pa'i byang 'phags rnams kyi rjes su slob la /
NK073(pu)007:1325: gsang sngags kyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi rjes su slob pa'o //
NK073(pu)007:1326: de ltar chos mnyam pa nyid mngon du gyur kyang
NK073(pu)007:1327: de ltar gtan nas ma rtogs pa dang phyogs re
NK073(pu)007:1328: las ma rtogs pa theg brgyad la gnas pa rnams
NK073(pu)007:1329: la thugs rje mi 'byung ba ma yin te dmigs
NK073(pu)007:1330: med kyi thugs rje ngo bo nyid lhun 'grub tu
NK073(pu)007:1331: 'byung ngo // mdor na gsang sngags mnyam pa chen
NK073(pu)007:1332: po'i dam tshig la spyod pa thams cad kyi thams
NK073(pu)007:1333: cad du rnam par ma dag pa med de /
NK073(pu)007:1334: ji lta bas ye nas rnam par dag par rtogs
NK073(pu)007:1335: pa bzhin du dka' thub dang brtul zhugs kyang de
NK073(pu)007:1336: ltar rnam par dag par spyod do zhes gsang sngags
NK073(pu)007:1337: mnyam pa chen po'i dam tshig gi slar sdud pa'i
NK073(pu)007:1338: tshig tu sbyar bar mdzad de theg pa 'og ma'i
NK073(pu)007:1339: dka' thub dang brtul zhugs las khyad par du gyur
NK073(pu)007:1340: par bstan pa'o // gsum pa mjug gi don la /
NK073(pu)007:1341: gdams ngag gang la gtad pa'i snod dang /
NK073(pu)007:1342: brtsams zin pa'i mtha' byang gdams pa gnyis las /
NK073(pu)007:1344: lta ba mtho dman gyi bye brag rnams phreng ba
NK073(pu)007:1345: bzhin du rgyun chags su bkod cing dgos pa bsdus
NK073(pu)007:1346: pas na / lta ba'i phreng ba ces bya ba
NK073(pu)007:1347: la gsang ba ni theg pa mtha' dag gi don
NK073(pu)007:1348: tshig nyung ngur bsdus nas blo la 'chang ba'i man
NK073(pu)007:1349: ngag bzhag pa yin pa dang /
NK073(pu)007:1350: tshig nyung ngu 'dis don mang po rtogs par byed
NK073(pu)007:1351: pa'i sgo nas sgron ma yin pas nor bu rin
NK073(pu)007:1352: po che bzhin du sbas shing bcad par bya ba'am
NK073(pu)007:1353: / rnam pa gcig tu na rdzogs pa chen po'i
NK073(pu)007:1354: don ni kun gyi thun mong ma yin pas thugs
NK073(pu)007:1355: rje chen po'i thabs kyis kyang gsang bar bya ba'i
NK073(pu)007:1357: ji ltar dmus long gzugs mi mthong ba dag nam
NK073(pu)007:1358: zhig rang gi bsod nams kyis nor bu rin po
NK073(pu)007:1359: che rnyed pa'am rang bzhin gyis phyi nas mi rnyed
NK073(pu)007:1360: pa ltar / thog med ma rig gis mdongs pa'i
NK073(pu)007:1361: skye bo yang dag pa'i don mthong ba myong ba
NK073(pu)007:1362: las nam zhig sngon gyi bsod nams kyi dge ba'i
NK073(pu)007:1364: de'i dbang gis shes rab gsum gyi mig rnyed de /
NK073(pu)007:1365: shes rab dang thabs kyi rtsal rnyed pa'am 'chang ba'i
NK073(pu)007:1366: rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po'i snod du gyur pa'i
NK073(pu)007:1367: skyes mchog yod na de'i don du gyur pa'i gdams
NK073(pu)007:1368: ngag rin po che 'di dang phrad par gyur cig
NK073(pu)007:1369: / ces smon lam du mdzad pa'o //
NK073(pu)007:1371: lta ba'i phreng ba ces bya ba'i man ngag slob
NK073(pu)007:1372: dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas bod yul nas slar
NK073(pu)007:1373: gshegs kar brag dmar mtsho mo 'gul gyi ne thang
NK073(pu)007:1374: du dgung gsum bzhes nas lha sras khri srong lde'u
NK073(pu)007:1375: btsan dang rje 'bangs 'gyes phyag gi dus su mdzad
NK073(pu)007:1377: 'di bris dge bas tshe rab thams cad du //
NK073(pu)007:1378: pad+ma 'jam pa'i rdo rje snying la zhugs //
NK073(pu)007:1379: yang dag lta ba'i zab gnad kun rtogs nas //
NK073(pu)007:1380: 'gro la rgyal ba'i lam bzang snang gyur cig /
NK073(pu)007:1381: mi pham pas thun bar gcig la bris pa mad+ga lam //
NK073(pu)007:1383: // zhes 'jam mgon smra ba'i seng ge mi pham 'od
NK073(pu)007:1384: gsal rdo rje'i phyag mchan sor bzhag la gsang ba'i
NK073(pu)007:1385: bdag po blo gros mtha' yas gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel
NK073(pu)007:1386: ba'i sa bcad kyis brgyan te rab tshes don grub
NK073(pu)007:1387: ces pa sa mo lug gi lor zhe chen ri
NK073(pu)007:1388: khrid du zhal bzhus shing sde snod 'dzin pa chen
NK073(pu)007:1389: po mkhan chen bla ma kun bzang dpal ldan zhus
NK073(pu)007:1390: chen mdzad de legs par gtan la phab pa'o //
NK073(pu)007:1391: rgyal ba rig 'dzin brgyud pa'i man ngag bcud //
NK073(pu)007:1392: rgyal dbang pad+ma'i thugs mtshor bskyil ba las //
NK073(pu)007:1393: rgyal blon las can 'khor la gdams pa'i phul //
NK073(pu)007:1394: rgyal bstan 'dzin pa rnams kyi gces nor lags //
NK073(pu)007:1395: dus kyi mthar yang skyob pa mchog de yi //
NK073(pu)007:1396: thugs bskyed smon pa'i re kh+aa ma rmas pas //
NK073(pu)007:1397: nye brgyud byin rlabs dang ldan bdud rtsi'i chab //
NK073(pu)007:1398: longs su spyod 'di skal pa cis mi bzang //
NK073(pu)007:1399: de slad 'jam mgon bla ma'i phyag mchan gzhung //
NK073(pu)007:1400: gus pas bshus la rang blos ma bslad snyam //
NK073(pu)007:1401: 'on kyang nongs gyur gang mchis bdag blo'i skyon //
NK073(pu)007:1402: chos spyan ldan pa rnam kyis bzod par mdzod //
NK073(pu)007:1403: de las byung ba'i rab dge dri med kyis //
NK073(pu)007:1404: theg mchog bstan pa'i pad tshal rgyas pa dang //
NK073(pu)007:1405: bdag kyang skye kun pad+ma'i bran gyur te //
NK073(pu)007:1406: yang dag lta ba'i lam bzang snang gyur cig /
